(including AES 128- and 256-bit) to review sensitive material safely while on the go<br>- Easily navigate and manage your files in phone memory and external SD card.<br>- Automatically unzip and install Android apps (.apk files) delivered as .zip files from Google Play, the Amazon Appstore and Samsung Appstore</p><p>Purchase the full package and gain access to even more powerful and RAR files<br>- Immediate access to ‘Zip &amp; email’ feature<br>- New feature: direct integration with Dropbox cloud storage</p><p>File Support and 3rd Party Integration</p><p>WinZip for Android Corporation</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.dlink.mydlink"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGwoZEhcKEWNvbS5kbGluay5teWRsaW5rEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  隨時隨地均可利用 Wi-Fi 或 3G/4G 連線快速輕鬆地觀看雲端攝影機即時內容與管理雲端路由器。無論您在辦公室裡、外出活動，或是在渡假，都可以利用 mydlink Lite 應用程式存取雲端攝影機、雲端路由器和 NVR，即使身在途中也可以辦到。 <p>您也可以查看雲端路由器目前的上傳/下載頻寬，或是管理您的無線網路安全性和狀態。您可以利用家長控制功能查看孩子趁您不在時瀏覽了哪些網站，甚至可以封鎖或解除封鎖個別裝置的網路存取。</p><p>如需詳細資訊，請移至 mydlink.com 或 dlink.com </p><p>功能： <br>- 觀看雲端攝影機即時視訊，還能觀看全螢幕畫面。<br>- 支援流暢高品質的 H.264 視訊串流 (限特定機型)<br>- 收聽攝影機麥克風傳送的音訊 (僅限啟用音訊的機型)  - 將攝影機的視訊快照儲存至 Android 手機上 <br> - 檢視雲端攝影機和雲端路由器的線上狀態 - 遠端監控及設定雲端路由器<br>- 透過 NVR 存取及檢視攝影機的視訊播放 (無聲)。<br>- 支援五分鐘的轉送模式遠端檢視。配備實用的 60 秒倒數計時器。 <br>- 使用觸控拖曳功能四處移動非 PT 攝影機的畫面。利用收合手勢放大/縮小。<br>- 攝影機可切換為「夜間」、「日間」及「自動」三種模式。<br>- 在 mydlink 網站上完成初次設定後，您可以使用此應用程式在支援的攝影機上啟用/停用動作/聲音偵測功能。<br>- 您可以利用雙向語音支援 (適用於 DCS-942L、DCS-5211L、DCS-5222L、DCS-2132L、DCS-2310L、DCS-7010L、DCS-6010L) 進行回話，攝影機會使麥克風靜音，避免在進行雙向語音通訊時出現回音。<br>- SD 卡播放功能 (適用於 DCS-942L、DCS-5211L、DCS-5222L)<br>- 攝影機韌體升級功能<br>- 支持推播通知：可挑選要接收哪些設備的推播通知。<br>- 近端模式: 可讓用戶搜索並連上與手機在同一網路上的攝影機。<br>- 線上安裝: 用戶可按照安裝指示一步一步完成攝影機的安裝與設定，包含帳戶綁定在內。</p><p><br>此應用程式適用於如下機型：<br>- 雲端攝影機：DCS-930L,DCS-932L,DCS-933L,DCS-931L,DCS-940L,DCS-942L,DCS-5211L,DCS-5222L,DCS-2332L,DCS-6010L,DCS-2132L,DCS-2310L,DCS-7010L,DCS-5020L,DCS-5010L,DCS-2136L, DCS-5222LB1, DCS-2330L<br>- 雲路由：DAP-1160L,DAP-1360L,DIR-140L,DIR-505L,DIR-506L,DIR-600L,DIR-600LW,DIR-602L,DIR-605L,DIR-605LW,DIR-619L,DIR-626L,DIR-636L,DIR-640L,DIR-645L,DIR-810L,DIR-820L,DIR-820LW,DIR-826L,DIR-836L,DIR-840L,DIR-845L,DIR-850L,DIR-855L,DIR-860L,DIR-865L,DIR-868L ,DIR-900L,DIR-905L,DSL-2770L,DSL-2870B,DSL-2890AL<br> - NVR：DNR-322L </p><p><br>如D-Link有發佈mydlink新產品,mydlink Lite會及時增加相容列表,以便您在任何地方及時連接設備. </p><p>使用mydlink Lite 需要註冊mydlink帳號. 要創建mydlink帳號請先運行光碟內的安裝程式.  </p><p>希望同時查看多隻攝影機影像的話，請使用平板專用的 "mydlink+"。</p><p>*The mydlink Lite app is dynamically linked to the FFmpeg shared video decoding library, which was compiled to contain LGPL decoders and splitters only. The repository can be cloned from git://github.com/dlinker/mydlink-Lite---Android.git using the git clone command.</p><p>mydlink Lite 正式支持 Android 4.0或以上機種, 請舊版使用者趕快更新.</p><p>*應用軟件不支持使用"dirty"版號 linux kernel的 Android 行動裝置(e.g. LG P990).</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" 首款根據星體運行變化預測個人運程的星座應用，看星座運程就選《星座魔法屋》！<p>在占星學上，黃道12星座是宇宙方位的代名詞，代表了12種基本性格原型，一個人出生時，各星體落入黃道上的位置，說明了一個人的先天性格及天賦。黃道12星座象徵心理層面，反映出一個人行為的表現的方式。於是將黃道分成12個星座，稱為黃道12星座。依次為白羊座、金牛座、雙子座、巨蟹座、獅子座、處女座、天秤座、天蠍座、射手座、摩羯座、水瓶座、雙魚座。</p><p>关注靈機命理館faecbook地址：https://www.facebook.com/linghit<br>更多命理資訊歡迎關注 Degrees, radians and grads are supported, indicated by DEG, RAD, GRAD in the display. Use the DRG key to change mode.</p><p>* If any of the digit keys are disabled, or the decimal point doesn't work, or you have answers with letters in, or basic arithmetic appears to be wrong, then you are in binary, octal or hexadecimal mode. Press DEC to return to decimal operation. 2.3+<br>- QNAP NAS 搭配 v3.8.0(或更新之版本)韌體 </p><p>主要功能介紹: <br>- 輕鬆存取檔案:無論何時何地,您都可以輕鬆存取 Turbo NAS 上的檔案。 <br>- 立即上傳檔案或照片:直接從行動裝置上傳照片或檔案到 Turbo NAS 中。 <br>- 分享更容易:為您想要分享的檔案建立下載連結,透過電子郵件或是手機簡訊傳送給他人;您也可以直接利用電子郵件夾帶檔案來分享出去。 <br>-便捷地管理:只需要使用行動裝置,就可以移動、複製、重新命名或刪除 Turbo NAS 裡的檔案。不用電腦也可輕鬆完成。 <br>-檔案離線閱讀:您可以輕鬆地將檔案從 Turbo NAS 上下載到行動裝置中離線閱讀,讓閱讀更具方便及彈性。</p><p></p> 一键锁屏，iPhone风格，在任意界面轻触悬浮图标即可进行锁屏，彻底解放您的电源键。<p>您需要允许一键锁屏获得锁屏管理权限，激活锁屏功能。</p><p>很抱歉因为卸载问题给很多用户带来困扰。卸载一键锁屏并没有问题，只是因为Android系统的局限性和一键锁屏的配置需要，卸载一键锁屏需要多一步操作。<br>我们已经在一键锁屏设置界面提供了直接卸载的功能，或者您也可以先到“系统设定—&gt;安全—&gt;设备管理器”中取消一键锁屏的锁屏权限，再执行正常的卸载操作。</p><p>如果您遇到任何问题，或者对我们的锁屏程序及方案有任何建议，请及时通知我们，谢谢！<br>E-mail: href="/store/apps/details?id=com.a0soft.gphone.aDataOnOff" title="省電超人 (2 Battery)"> 169.    省電超人 (2 Battery)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Sam+Lu" title="Sam Lu">Sam Lu</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.a0soft.gphone.aDataOnOff"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJgokEiIKHGNvbS5hMHNvZnQuZ3Bob25lLmFEYXRhT25PZmYQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  你是否有手機電力總無法撐過一天的困惱？依使用者實際使用結果，2 Battery (省電超人) 可以幫你延長多達70%的使用時間。<p>*** 已超過 10,000,000 使用者，並證明有效 ***</p><p>為什麼會這麼神奇？因為這個應用會在你關閉螢幕後，靠著定期幫你開關網路連線，來達到延長電池使用時間的目的。並利用我們獨特的技術，仍保持其他應用資料的同步。</p><p>您不需要再手動開關網路。使用這個應用，不僅可以節省電力的消耗，延長你的使用時間，也可降低你的手機上網費用。</p><p>1. 當螢幕關掉時自動開關網路(3G/4G/WiFi)連線<br>2. 上方狀態列上顯示電池剩餘電量與最近使用資訊<br>3. 安裝後即可使用，使用4小時候即見省電效果</p><p>Toggling mobile data does not work on Android 5 unless you use a rooted device. We can still help to toggle Wi-Fi or use screen filter for saving the battery.</p><p>特色<br>★ 螢幕關閉時，自動定期開關網路，以減少電力之使用與節省數據的使用費用<br>★ 螢幕開啟後，馬上啟用網路，並維持網路的連線，直到關閉螢幕為止<br>★ 可設定當螢幕解鎖時，不要立即啟用行動網路連線<br>★ 支援夜間模式功能 (PRO-only)<br>★ 無廣告 (PRO-only)<br>★ 支援黑、白名單功能<br>★ 當你將手機放入口袋或面朝下放在桌上時，可設定是否要自動關閉螢幕<br>★ 內建螢幕遮光片功能，可更進一步降低螢幕亮度及節省電力<br>★ 當電池充飽或電量不足時，可設定是否發出通知<br>★ 可以自行設定網路的定期開啟週期<br>★ 可設定當充電時是否要保持網路的連線<br>★ 可設定在當鎖定或解除螢幕鎖定時，發出提醒音效<br>★ 提供不同電池圖示風格<br>★ 支援桌面小工具<br>★ 提供並顯示各式電池使用資訊，包含剩餘電力、已使用的電力、距上次充電的使用時間、預估電力即將耗盡時間、電池健康狀態、電壓，溫度等等</p><p>DashClock Extension<br>★ requires DashClock Widget by Roman Nurik<br>★ estimated battery run out time<br>★ detailed battery information<br>★ battery icon theme (battery icon &amp; level, battery level)</p><p>Sony SmartWatch 2<br>★ 當手機電力不足時，會透過手錶發出警訊<br>★ 小工具，應用模式都會顯示手機電力資訊<br>★ 支援低耗電模式<br>★ Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2</p><p>Sony SmartWatch 1<br>★ 當手機電力不足時，會透過手錶發出警訊<br>★ 小工具，應用模式都會顯示手機電力資訊<br>★ LiveWare™ extension for SmartWatch</p><p>評論文章或影片<br>✔ http://goo.gl/ge7fLN (挨踢路人甲)<br>✔ http://goo.gl/MfKas (重灌狂人)<br>✔ http://goo.gl/BxIQn (電腦王阿達)<br>✔ http://goo.gl/KWCmDc (video)<br>✔ http://goo.gl/vOMFX (video)<br>✔ http://goo.gl/VlZGQ<br>✔ http://goo.gl/qAdkI</p><p>注意事項<br>★ 解除安裝前請先卸載 "自動關閉螢幕" 設備管理員<br>★ 當行動網路被關掉時，只表示手機的上網功能被暫時關閉。打電話，傳簡訊等功能，都不會受到影響。</p><p>不滿意保證退費<br>Google 的 15 分鐘試用時間對這類軟體來說顯然太短了，您可以試用 PRO 版 24 You'll know exactly what needs to get done, who's going to do it, and what's coming up next. Plus, everything you do is synced and saved instantly to the cloud, so that all your devices are always up to date.</p><p>With Trello, you can create boards to organize anything you're working on. Use them solo, or invite colleagues, friends, and family to work together.</p><p>Write your ideas down on Trello cards and arrange them in lists on your boards. Add details to your cards such as:</p><p>• checklists to keep track of to-dos<br>• comments to update your co-workers<br>• photos and videos<br>• who's working on that card</p><p>With the Trello app in your pocket, you can make to-do lists waiting in line at the grocery store, assign tasks to your co-worker while you're on the train home, or upload a photo of that paisley couch you saw the store that's just perfect for the house you're furnishing.</p><p>Trello is great with Wear! 183.    iTranslate - 免费的翻译工具  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Sonico+Mobile" title="Sonico Mobile">Sonico Mobile</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="at.nk.tools.iTranslate"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFmF0Lm5rLnRvb2xzLmlUcmFuc2xhdGUQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  iTranslate是一款获奖的翻译工具，可以帮助你打破语言障碍。它采用了最新技术，让你瞬间会说任何语言。<p>« 比学日语更简单 » - Sonia Gil (NBC Today) <br>« ...始终是我的主屏幕上的应用之一 » - Christian Zibreg (iDownloadBlog) <br>« 更简单、更干净、更平滑 » - Aldrin Calimlim (App Advice) </p><p>90+种语言<br>使用iTranslate，你可以翻译超过90种语言的单词、短语和文本。</p><p>语音输出 <br>是否想知道澳大利亚英语的女声发音是什么样的？使用iTranslate，你可以选择很多不同的方言，并可选择男声或女声，甚至可控制语速。</p><p>语音输入(高级版) <br>开口说就行，不用打字，无需训练。只需张口说，应用可识别你的声音，并将其转换成文字，翻译成另一种语言。</p><p>词典 <br>大多数翻译应用每个翻译只给出一个结果。而翻译的单词和短语往往根据上下文有多种含义。iTranslate提供许多语言词典，可准确地解决这个问题。</p><p>罗马化 <br>使用罗马化，你可以将“你好“转换成“Nǐ hǎo“。将非拉丁语言转化成拉丁字符。许多语言支持此功能，包括中文、日语、韩语、希腊语、印地语、俄语及泰语。</p><p>更快输入 <br>iTranslate经过输入优化，打字速度更快。输入时可获得建议，将手机横屏，更大的横屏键盘可让你双手输入，还可以利用受欢迎的滑动手势进行快速复制和粘贴。</p><p>分享 <br>可通过电子邮件、短信、Facebook或Twitter发送翻译给朋友，或复制翻译并在任何喜欢的应用内使用。</p><p>收藏和历史 <br>可浏览最近的翻译或保存翻译以便稍后离线访问。</p><p><br>* iTranslate高级版 <br>iTranslate供免费下载使用。iTranslate高级版无广告并解锁了语音识别。可通过一次性应用内购买进行升级。</p><p>欲了解iTranslate更多信息，请访问我们的网站: <br>http://itranslateapp.com/ </p><p>请注意: iTranslate需要网络连接。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" It's the best smart keyboard for Android for fast SMS, chat, text and email, becoming the default across all your apps. It’s packed full of customization features including over 70 colorful themes, layouts for all screen sizes and devices, and supports over 80 languages.</p><p>SMARTER AUTOCORRECT<br>Intelligent autocorrections for even the sloppiest typing.</p><p>EMOJI AND EMOJI PREDICTION<br>Express yourself with over 800 emoji characters (emoticons) and useful Emoji Prediction that learns your favorites. 備忘錄/日記  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Wizard+Works" title="Wizard Works">Wizard Works</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.somcloud.somnote"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHgocEhoKFGNvbS5zb21jbG91ZC5zb21ub3RlEAEYAw==" 棉花筆記是目前最優秀的筆記應用，活躍用戶超過200萬名。棉花筆記擁有精美的設計頁面和超快的反應速度。無需任何花費，您就可以更改字體，還能將圖片和文件添加到筆記中。筆記及附件將自動進行備份，並且可以通過電腦、iPad等其他設備獲取文件。即使是您使用的設備被格式化，所備份的筆記和文件也能安全保存。筆記應用的未來盡在棉花筆記。點擊查看詳情。<p>★ 特點</p><p>- 記錄筆記：用棉花筆記記錄並編輯。您可以將拍攝的照片或手繪的畫，添加到筆記中。想要閱讀PDF或文本文件？只需要將文件從電腦上拖進移動設備，即可在移動設備上閱讀。</p><p>- 建立文件夾：棉花筆記現已設置文件夾功能。您可隨意選擇文件夾顏色，任意命名——根據個人喜好，對筆記隨意進行分類。</p><p>- 保護隱私：棉花筆記將有效保護您的筆記。您可以鎖定筆記、文件夾甚至鎖定棉花筆記應用。輕輕鬆松，保護日記隱私！</p><p>- 尋找筆記：您可以通過搜索菜單，尋找任意一條筆記。棉花筆記將即刻高亮標示出您搜索的每一條筆記，同時建立相關條目文件夾。</p><p>★ 其他功能</p><p>- 自動備份：如果您希望即使在重新設置或丟失設備後仍能保存筆記及附件，我們的自動備份系統可以幫您！只要用您的棉花筆記賬號登錄，就可以安全地自動備份您的全部筆記和文件。</p><p>- 字體：在設定菜單中，不僅默認字體免費提供，而且棉花筆記保留的另外四種可愛字體都免費！我們還將持續添加新字體。</p><p>- 排序：在設定菜單中，您可以給筆記排序，比如按字母順序或創建時間。一旦設定，排序方式將持續有效。</p><p>- 恢復：如果使用我們的自動備份系統，您能於棉花筆記在線將筆記恢復到任何希望的時點狀態（“時間機器系統”）。而且通過在線系統，您甚至可以將已經刪除的筆記恢復（“垃圾箱系統”）。</p><p>棉花筆記將以即時更新的方式不斷完善。您在使用該應用的過程中遇到任何問題，都可隨時聯絡我們。聯絡號碼見下，我們十分樂意回應您的要求。</p><p>謝謝</p><p>- 190.    LOCX：程式鎖（App Lock）  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=CY+Security" title="CY Security">CY Security</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  ★★★ 慶祝！ LOCX 榮獲 Android Community、Android Headlines、Zuimeia.com、DGtle 等全球媒體的傾力推薦！★★★<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br>LOCX 的特點：<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br>☆ 保護之至，為你定制：為你日常使用的一些程式加鎖，每一次鎖定都更加簡單易用、無比智慧。再也不必擔心因為孩子購買應用而支付一筆不必要的費用。<p>☆ 更多功能，卻只需更小空間：比起以往，LOCX 現在變的更快、更輕了。相比他人，為你的手機節省更多空間，多達一半。 APK 文件尺寸也得到顯著減小，低至1.8 MB。</p><p>☆ Material design，更是全新設計：我們完全重新設計了全新版本的LOCX，並且全球領先地應用了Google 的 material design。細節精緻、充滿吸引。</p><p>☆ 難以置信，免費，還免去廣告：一直以來，堅持免費、堅持清爽。不只因你能免費地享受這一切，也是因為這一切都不被廣告所干擾。它是免費的，但仍然是足夠精緻的。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br>LOCX 的功能：<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br>► 應用鎖：為你的手機和所有的隱私信息提供保護。所以單獨的應用而不必為整個手機加鎖。選擇圖案鎖定或者 PIN，依你所好。</p><p>► 照片保險箱：隱藏並加密你的照片，不必擔心一些應用中的隱私信息被他人看到。</p><p>► 主題： 我們驕傲地發布了多個由全球頂級設計師為應用鎖創作的主題和壁紙。每一個都如此美妙與驚艷。你可以在“LOCX” &gt; “側邊導航” &gt; “主題”中進行應用。</p><p>► 變色龍：將你的屏幕鎖定偽裝起來，避免他人試圖破解密碼。指紋掃描器、強制停止2 種偽裝現已發布，更多支持即將到來。</p><p>► 延時鎖定： 應用短暫退出時不會被重新鎖定，避免頻繁解鎖，應用切換更加流暢。</p><p>► 快速鎖定/ 解鎖： 快速、便捷。在您的屏幕上添加小部件（widget），啟用或禁用應用鎖，只需輕輕一點。</p><p>► 高級保護： 激活Android 設備管理器，防止應用鎖被他人卸載，為你的手機提供最嚴格的保護。令人驚喜的是，所有功能全部免費。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br>關於我們：<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br>我們的Google+：https://plus.google.com/106670190845563174025</p><p>我們的Facebook：https://www.facebook.com/cylockpage</p><p>我們的beta <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=ZenWatch,+ASUSTeK+Computer+Inc." title="ZenWatch, ASUSTeK Computer Inc.">ZenWatch, ASUSTeK Computer Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.asus.watchmanager"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHwodEhsKFWNvbS5hc3VzLndhdGNobWFuYWdlchABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  *華碩手錶管理大師只支援 ASUS ZenWatch 智慧型手錶.*<p>華碩手錶管理大師無縫整合您的智慧型手機和 ASUS ZenWatch 智慧型手錶，開啟ZenWatch 的所有功能。華碩手錶管理大師提供您客製化的手錶錶面，並提供多項獨家功能，包括：覆蓋即可靜音手機來電鈴聲、尋找我的手錶或手機、遺忘手機警告，更能在緊急情況時以手動方式寄出預設訊息。</p><p>與華碩提供的多種穿戴式應用程式整合，華碩手錶管理大師具更備多樣化功能。您可以直接使用華碩手錶管理大師開啟智慧型手機以及平板裝置。當您的手機和平板不在手邊時，華碩手錶管理大師還會震動提醒，也提供實用工具包括指南針、手電筒等。<br>　</p><p>Android 是  Google Inc. 登記的商標</p><p>媒體推薦 </p><p>ASUS' stylish ZenWatch is all about security, remote control and wellness<br>http://www.engadget.com/2014/09/03/asus-zenwatch-android-wear-specs/</p><p>ASUS ZenWatch: A Fancy Smartwatch That Measures Your Relaxation Levels<br>http://mashable.com/2014/09/03/asus-zenwatch/</p><p>主要功能介紹<br>•	提供您自主客製手錶錶面，包括走路步數、卡路里燃燒數、天氣狀況、未接電話通知、電池電量以及可選擇的時區等多樣化資訊。</p><p>•	您可以設定緊急聯絡人以及連絡訊息，當遭遇緊急情況時，您可以透過 ASUS ZenWatch 啟動手機，送出預設訊息給緊急連絡人。</p><p>•	配置 解鎖我的手機 功能，直接使用 ASUS ZenWatch 開啟智慧型手機以及平板裝置。當手錶與手機藍芽斷線後，會啟用PIN碼保護。(僅支援Android™ 4.3 以及 Android 4.4 ) </p><p>•	當您的手機和手錶配對之後，您可在華碩手錶管理大師中設定以手機尋找手錶。手錶會發出亮光以及震動以警示，讓您容易找到。您也可以用手錶找手機。　　</p><p>•	當您使用微軟的視窗作業系統 Microsoft® Windows 操作簡報時，同步搭配使用 ASUS Remote Link 應用程式， ASUS ZenWatch 即刻變成簡報遙控器，還可掌握簡報時間。</p><p>•	搭配使用 ZenWatch遙控相機應用程式， ASUS ZenWatch 即刻成為智慧型手機的另一個鏡頭。您可以用它盡情發揮創意，拍攝過往不易取景的角度！</p><p>•	搭配使用 ZenWatch Wellness 應用程式，您可以充分監控您的走路步數、燃燒卡路里以及心跳等健康數據，保持身心平衡的生活。</p><p>注意事項<br>•	在下載並啟動華碩手錶管理大師之前，請先下載 Android Wear 應用程式。<br>•	華碩手錶管理大師僅支援華碩智慧型手錶 ASUS ZenWatch。</p><p>更多資訊 <br>更多的產品資訊和影片，請參考官方網站 http://www.asus.com/tw/ZenUI/ </p><p>回饋與建議<br>我們期待聽到您的意見和回饋！<br>聯絡我們：zenui@asus.com</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.rechild.advancedtaskkiller" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.rechild.advancedtaskkiller" title="Advanced Task Killer"> 194.    Advanced Task Killer  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=ReChild" title="ReChild">ReChild</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.rechild.advancedtaskkiller"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKAomEiQKHmNvbS5yZWNoaWxkLmFkdmFuY2VkdGFza2tpbGxlchABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Advanced Task Killer is also known as ATK which is #1 task manage app. It is a tool to kill applications and boost memory. <br>-Ignore List<br>-One tap widget<br>-Auto kill<br>-Customize item height<p>ATK is often used to kill app and clean memory. We do suggest people use ATK manually kill apps instead of auto killing app.</p><p>1. How to use it (for new users to quick start)?</p><p>ATK is pretty simple. Open this tool and take a look at the running applications list? Uncheck some apps you don't want to kill (such as Advanced Task Killer and some system apps) Tap the button 'Kill selected apps', it will kill all applications checked.</p><p> </p><p>2. How to use it (for new users to do more)?</p><p>If you don't want to kill any app, you can tap it on the running applications list. Then it's checking box will turn to gray.</p><p> </p><p>3. Why there are app running that I haven't used or even opened?</p><p>Some app will start up once you turn on your phone or be invoked by some events.</p><p> </p><p>4. What is ignore list/ignore?</p><p>Ignore list is for you to ignore some app you don't want to kill. If you long press on the app listed on the main screen of ATK, the menu will pop up, then you can select 'Ignore', the application would be moved to ignore list. When you tap 'Kill selected apps', it won't be killed any more.</p><p> </p><p>5. What is default action for long press?</p><p>You can set your default action for long press and click on the settings. The system default action for long press is pop-menu. That means you when you long press on the application (displays on the running applications list), a pop-menu would shows up. For example, if you want to switch to the application after you long press on it, you can set the default action of long press to 'Switch to'.</p><p> </p><p>6. Why I lost my network connection after I tap 'kill selected apps'?</p><p> This is because some apps related with network connection are killed, such as 'voicemail'. You can ignore it instead of killing it.</p><p> </p><p>7. Why my Home reloaded?</p><p>This is because some apps related with Home are killed. Such as 'HTC Sense', 'Mail'(if it is integrated with Home). You can ignore it instead of killing it.</p><p> </p><p>8. Why I cannot receive notification of Email?</p><p>This is because you killed 'Email'. Instead of killing it, you need to ignore it.</p><p> </p><p>9. What is Auto Kill?</p><p>If you want to kill apps automatically you need to choose one of auto-kill level</p><p>- Safe: Only kill the apps aren't running but still consume memory.</p><p>- Aggressive: Kill the apps running background and apps aren't running.</p><p>- Crazy: All apps except for apps you are using with.</p><p>You should be able to see Auto Kill information shows on the title, like 'Auto-Kill: 12:20'. That means auto kill will start at 12:20, you can also change the frequency to impact the auto kill start time. </p><p>App killer is only a tool to kill apps and task. It won't help your battery directly. But if you kill any app which consumes battery a lot, you might think app killer is helping your battery.<br>Advanced Task Killer Pro is paid version which doesn't contain ads.<br>Note: For android 2.2 and later version, task manager cannot kill services and front apps, you have to force stop them. If you use task manager to kill them, services might restart; also notification won't be erased from the top bar. So we don't suggest people use task manager kill them.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> PDF Reader"> 202.    Foxit MobilePDF - PDF Reader  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Foxit+Software+Inc." title="Foxit Software Inc.">Foxit Software Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" class="description">  您是否還在尋找一款體積小、運行快速而且免費使用的PDF閱讀器？不妨試試Foxit MobilePDF！Foxit MobilePDF提供與Foxit Reader和Foxit Phantom PDF電子文件處理套件相同的PDF顯示引擎，採用與谷歌流覽器內嵌Foxit Reader相同的基礎技術，可以為廣大用戶提供快速和清晰的閱讀體驗。Foxit MobilePDF不僅僅是個閱讀器，它還提供豐富的功能，支援在安卓手機和平板電腦中閱讀、注釋、管理和共用PDF檔，為移動用戶提供最佳的PDF閱讀體驗，保證移動用戶可以隨時隨地輕鬆處理PDF檔。Foxit MobilePDF支援Foxit Cloud服務，可以與Foxit Reader無縫整合，提供與桌面產品一致的PDF閱讀體驗，讓您可以隨時隨地享受舒適的閱讀之旅。<p>查看PDF文件<br>•	快速打開PDF文件；顯示迅速且清晰<br>•	支援搜索、捲動瀏覽和縮放<br>•	支援各種類型的視圖模式，包括單頁模式、連續頁模式、縮圖模式<br>•	支援純文字閱讀模式，特別針對智慧手機用戶<br>•	支援按輸入的頁碼跳轉到檔中的某一頁<br>•	支援開啟有密碼保護的檔案<br>•	支援開啟檔中的網頁頁面超連結<br>•	支援查看文件屬性，包括文件常規資訊和安全設置</p><p>支援對PDF檔增添批註<br>•	基於Foxit壓感技術(Pressure Sensitive Ink Technology)，支援鉛筆注釋，手動建立簽名及應用簽名<br>•	提供一套功能豐富的注釋工具（包括文字標記工具、繪圖工具、簽名工具、打字機工具和備註工具），支援在PDF檔案中增添注釋<br>•	輕鬆設置批註的顏色、透明度、線寬以及外觀效果<br>•	支援撤銷、重做<br>•	支持扁平化注釋</p><p><br>大綱、書籤注釋管理<br>•	通過大綱瀏覽檔<br>•	支援增添和編輯書籤來記錄特定的閱讀資訊<br>•	支援通過注釋面板列出PDF檔中的所有批註，並附有注釋作者、頁碼資訊、增添日期和注釋內容</p><p>文件管理<br>•	支援在螢幕中通過手指滑動切換視圖（本地檔視圖、雲端視圖、歷史瀏覽記錄）<br>•	支援按檔案名、大小、最後更新日期對PDF檔排序<br>•	支援搜索PDF檔案<br>•	支援建立資料夾<br>•	支援對檔或者資料夾進行重命名、複製、移動、刪除<br>•	支援通過藍牙、郵件或Wi-Fi分享檔案</p><p>檔案保護<br>•	支援採用密碼保護PDF檔案<br>•	支援通過證書加密PDF檔案（應用軟體內購買功能）<br>——適用于安卓2.3及以上系統<br>——使用證書加解密檔案前，需要將證書檔案複製到安卓設備記憶體中<br>•	支援設置PDF檔案操作許可權，如複製、注釋和列印等</p><p>公有雲整合<br>•	支援訪問公共雲服務如Dropbox、SkyDrive、Google Drive、Box、金山快盤和OneDrive<br>•	支援在公共雲服務上傳或下載檔案<br>•	支援通過網頁連結分享PDF檔案</p><p>PDF表單<br>•	填寫和保存PDF表單<br>•	螢光標示可填寫的表單欄位<br>•	重置表單欄位<br>•	導入和匯出表單數據<br>•	扁平化表單欄位<br>•	支援JavaScript腳本動作</p><p><br>其他有用的功能<br>•	支援橫向螢幕模式、直式螢幕模式、自動旋轉螢幕模式<br>•	支援白天、夜間閱讀模式<br>•	可調節亮度設置</p><p>支援的語言：<br>英語，簡體中文，繁體中文，荷蘭語，法語，德語，義大利語，日語，韓語，葡萄牙語，俄語，西班牙語</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> WiFi Manager  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Kostya+Vasilyev" title="Kostya Vasilyev">Kostya Vasilyev</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="org.kman.WifiManager"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHgocEhoKFG9yZy5rbWFuLldpZmlNYW5hZ2VyEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Find, connect, manage WiFi networks. Improve connection quality with a graphical channel radar. Discover open networks around you.<p>Includes home screen widgets: one displays detailed connection info, another lets you switch among your favorite networks with a single tap, and yet another toggles WiFi Access Point.</p><p>Can scan for and switch to the best network out of several configured.</p><p>New and improved:</p><p>• "Material design" widgets (version 3.5).</p><p>• A UI redesign (version 3.0): modern looking icons, swiping between list and radar views.</p><p>• Assign your own descriptions and icons to individual WiFi networks - never forget what that "XYZ1234" network is;</p><p>• Switch among your favorite networks with a single tap by using the WiFi Network Switcher widget. It will even enable WiFi if needed.</p><p>• "Best network" to switch between different networks you may have around the house or office (off by default, enable in app settings);</p><p>• Automatic switching between fixed and dynamic (DHCP) IP addresses (Android Settings in 2.* can't do this);</p><p>Some features require that you purchase the $1.75 premium package, available right in the application through Google Checkout (safe, secure).</p><p>These features are: advanced per-network options (description, icon, IP address), the one-tap network widget, and two widget themes inspired by Android 5.* (Material Design, since version 3.5).</p><p>All the other - essential - features are free: the widget with detailed connection info (four sizes, two free themes), scanning and connecting to networks, the network list view, the network signal radar.</p><p>Orders are processed and saved by Google and can be reactivated after a phone reset / flash, or on a new phone.</p><p>About requested permissions:</p><p>"Change system settings" is needed to switch between fixed and dynamic IP addresses, if configured so.</p><p>"Prevent phone from sleeping" is needed so you can enable automatic scanning and discover open networks around you.</p><p>"Read USB storage" for notifications about open networks, when enabled, and the sound file is picked from the memory card.</p><p>"Market billing service" is needed to make purchases.</p><p>•••<br>Since version 2.5, supports per-network IP address and proxy server settings on Android 3.* / 4.*, included in the free version.<br>•••<br>If you have an issue or a question, please contact me at kmansoft@gmail.com (email is also shown in the about box and below).<br>•••</p><p>Also - a visually matching Bluetooth toggle widget. class="description">  9/10 "an almost perfect calendar" - Softonic, September 2013<p>FEATURES<br>● intuitive navigation with smooth transitions between day, week and month view<br>● 48 colors per calendar, 12 per-event colors if supported by the calendar (Android 4.1+ with Google calendars only)<br>● flexible recurrences (e.g., every 2 weeks or every 3rd day - first select weekly or daily, 'Send Email to guests' is bound to 'write calendar data' by Google. NFC is for sharing events by touching another NFC-enabled phone, and requires manual confirmation.</p><p>APP2SD<br>Unfortunately app2SD cannot be supported, because homescreen widgets do not work from SD. This is an Android limitation. But aCalendar is optimized not only for speed but also for size.</p><p>LOVE<br>♥ aCalendar is made with love, sweat and tears in the heart of Munich. Inc.">Keeper Security, Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.callpod.android_apps.keeper"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKQonEiUKH2NvbS5jYWxscG9kLmFuZHJvaWRfYXBwcy5rZWVwZXIQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Keeper® 是世界上最安全的密碼管理器和數據庫。<p>您很難記住密碼和私人信息嗎？您在每個網站上使用相同的密碼嗎？您想確保您的私人文件的安全性嗎？如果是，您需要Keeper。</p><p>密碼管理器<br>Keeper是一款使用方便且安全的密碼管理器，幫助您遠離黑客。您的密碼、用戶名、信用卡卡號、銀行賬號和其它私人信息可儲存在您加密且牢不可破的私人數據庫中。 Keeper的密碼生成器能幫助您爲不同的網站創建高強度密碼，這是能保護您隱私的最佳方案。</p><p> Keeper 排名 #1<br>Keeper支持16國語言，並擁有全球5百萬以上用戶。Keeper也是目前支持iPhone、iPad、Mac和 PC的最受歡迎的密碼管理器和數據庫。 Keeper使用最高級別的隱私安全技術（ 256位 AES加密、 PBKDF2），它也是零知識服務提供者。這意味著只有您本人才可以訪問您的信息。 </p><p>操作簡單易懂<br>您可以在任何電腦或移動設備上使用Keeper。有了Keeper，您可即時搜尋記錄並能有效地進行記錄管理。此外，您還可以與其他Keeper用戶（如：您的朋友或同事）共享私人記錄。更贊的是，您可以在線使用Keeper網路應用程式來訪問您的數據，該程式與您賬號下的其他設備同步。</p><p>安全的文件管理器 <br>我們的安全文件存儲功能可以將您的保密文件、照片、視訊和其他資料上傳至您的Keeper數據庫。 所有上傳的文件都經加密並由與零知識加密技術來確保其安全性。該加密技術也被使用在您的密碼管理上。與同類雲存儲提供者相比，Keeper 更安全。</p><p>當您從所使用的移動設備上傳某個文件或照片時，或者當您通過網路應用程式（<br>https://keepersecurity.com）將某個文件照片拖拉至數據庫時，該文件便被即時加密並保存至 Keeper's Cloud Security Vault。該文件不會出現在您的相冊或SD卡中。</p><p>自動填寫用戶名和密碼 <br>我們有最安全的密碼管理器的自動填寫功能。此外，您也可以通過您的桌面電腦來無縫訪問您的數據。Keeper支持Chrome、Safari、Firefox和Internet Explorer。</p><p>安全共享 <br>使用Keeper來共享您的密碼既簡單又安全。只需點按數據庫中的“共享”按鈕，然後邀請您的朋友或者同事來查看該記錄即可。通過使用公開/私人秘鑰加密以及256位AES加密，Keeper能進行安全的庫到庫的密碼和文件共享。</p><p>兩步驟驗證 <br>Keeper支持使用簡訊、語音和谷歌身份驗證的兩步驟驗證，爲用戶提供額外保護。</p><p> 內部控制<br>Keeper已通過SOC-2認證。這意味著我們嚴格遵循最高水平的內部控制的標准，涵蓋安全性、可用性、處理完整性、保密性和隱私。<br> <br> Keeper for Groups &amp; Enterprise<br>Keeper 爲企業用戶所提供的密碼管理産品的名稱爲 Keeper for Groups。通過管理控制台，組群管理者可以管理其組群用戶及設備。我們也支持Active Directory。如想了解詳情，請訪問https://keepersecurity.com/zh_HK/groups。</p><p>預設在AT&amp;T 手機上<br>Keeper被預設在 AT&amp;T Android 和nWindows 智能手機 &amp; 平板電腦上。</p><p>免費版 vs. 付費版<br>Keeper 在您設備上提供免費存儲服務。您可以30天免費試用同步 &amp; 雲備份功能，之後，您需要支付年費以繼續使用付費功能。您可以通過應用內或者我司網站https://keepersecurity.com/zh_HK/buy 進行購買。 </p><p>請參考https://keepersecurity.com了解詳情。</p><p>Keeper、Password Keeper和Keeper標識是Keeper Security, Inc.的注冊商標。</p><p>美國專利號 No. 8656504 和 8738934。<br>專利待定</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span 安靜的睡眠，您可以設置您的睡眠時間，睡覺的時候保證您不會被各種網路信息打擾，一大早起來，數據就會同步妥當。<br>4. 充電的時候允許設置是否關閉省電模式。<br>5. 白名單機制帶有自動超時功能，在線聽歌睡著了也不怕。</p><p><br>■ 用戶評價<br>-----------------------------<br>"找設定找了很久!! 找了很久，才發現安裝好根本不用設定什麼 中文版)是Android系統的工具，它可以清理無用的應用程序緩存文件，它可以節省您的手機的磁盤空間，讓你的手機加快。★超過250萬用戶使用它來清理手機緩存！<p>[什麼是應用程序緩存文件]</p><p>應用程序緩存文件的應用程序創建的臨時文件。例如，當瀏覽器訪問一個網頁，它會緩存文件保存的圖像文件。應用程序結束時，這些緩存文件是沒有用的，所以你需要一個系統工具，幫助你清理這些舊的緩存文件。經常清理緩存，是一個好習慣，它可以節省你的磁盤空間，讓你的手機加快。</p><p>[特點]</p><p>★ 一鍵式清潔系統緩存<br>★ 最快的掃描速度<br>★ 高速緩存的大小或名稱排序的應用程序<br>★ 提醒功能<br>★ 兩種顯示風格<br>★ 更多功能即將推出</p><p></p><p>請不要猶豫，建議或報告錯誤，請聯繫 bazingatech@hotmail.com</p><p>Website of Icon Calendar Widget: Month+Agenda  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=IT+Benefit" title="IT Benefit">IT Benefit</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.itbenefit.android.calendar"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKAomEiQKHmNvbS5pdGJlbmVmaXQuYW5kcm9pZC5jYWxlbmRhchABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  <p>This is a simple calendar widget where the month view and today's agenda are combined together. It gives you a good overview of your events at hand in your home screen.</p><p></p><p>PLEASE NOTE: This is a trial version with NO TIME LIMIT. After 7 days, you will be asked to buy the license key to unlock more options and support further development. But you could continue use this app for free as long as you want until you decide to buy it or not.</p><p></p><p>ALSO NOTE: It is NOT a calendar app. It's only a widget. To make it work you should add it on your home screen (like on the screenshots).</p><p>Features:<br>• Synced with Google calendars<br>• Shows markers for dates with events<br>• Shows today's agenda<br>• Shows week numbers (optional)<br>• Opens default calendar app by taping on date<br>• Beautiful and clean design<br>• Looks similar to HTC Calendar Widget (from HTC Sense)</p><p></p><p>The app still in BETA stage and may be not perfectly stable, so if you are getting problems or have any ideas, please let me know at calendar@itbenefit.com.</p><p></p><p>Don't forget to rate and comment it if you like it :-)</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.itbenefit.android.calendar" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=com.itbenefit.android.calendar" tabindex="-1"> <div class="reason-set-star-rating">  <div class="tiny-star star-rating-non-editable-container" aria-label="獲評為 4.2 顆星 (總分 5 顆星)"> <div class="current-rating" style="width: 83.34186553955078%;"></div> </div>  </div> </a> <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.itbenefit.android.calendar"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKAomEiQKHmNvbS5pdGJlbmVmaXQuYW5kcm9pZC5jYWxlbmRhchABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </span> </div> </div>   </div><div class="card no-rationale square-cover apps small" data-docid="oms.mmc.fortunetelling.gmpay.almanac2_hd" data-original-classes="card no-rationale square-cover apps small" data-short-classes="card no-rationale square-cover apps small"> <div class="card-content id-track-click id-track-impression" data-docid="oms.mmc.fortunetelling.gmpay.almanac2_hd" data-server-cookie="CAIaMgowEi4KKG9tcy5tbWMuZm9ydHVuZXRlbGxpbmcuZ21wYXkuYWxtYW5hYzJfaGQQARgD" data-uitype="500">  <a class="card-click-target" data-server-cookie="CAIaMgowEi4KKG9tcy5tbWMuZm9ydHVuZXRlbGxpbmcuZ21wYXkuYWxtYW5hYzJfaGQQARgD" data-uitype="500" href="/store/apps/details?id=oms.mmc.fortunetelling.gmpay.almanac2_hd" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a> <div class="cover"> <div class="cover-image-container"> <div class="cover-outer-align"> <div class="cover-inner-align"> <img alt="佛曆-日曆農曆節氣 佛誕紀念日查看" class="cover-image" data-cover-large="https://lh4.ggpht.com/HjA4MlV40lDPvkKRCq51pKEBNekmWq2FEQ899nLo0e6-MGq0kUiVLUnnBA0QggRDY54=w340-rw" data-cover-small="https://lh4.ggpht.com/HjA4MlV40lDPvkKRCq51pKEBNekmWq2FEQ899nLo0e6-MGq0kUiVLUnnBA0QggRDY54=w170-rw" src="https://lh4.ggpht.com/HjA4MlV40lDPvkKRCq51pKEBNekmWq2FEQ899nLo0e6-MGq0kUiVLUnnBA0QggRDY54=w170-rw" aria-hidden="true"> </div> </div> </div> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=oms.mmc.fortunetelling.gmpay.almanac2_hd" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">  <span class="movies preordered-overlay-container id-preordered-overlay-container" style="display:none"> <span class="preordered-label">已預購</span> </span> <span class="preview-overlay-container" data-docid="oms.mmc.fortunetelling.gmpay.almanac2_hd">  </span>  </a>  </div> <div class="details"> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=oms.mmc.fortunetelling.gmpay.almanac2_hd" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=oms.mmc.fortunetelling.gmpay.almanac2_hd" title="佛曆-日曆農曆節氣 佛誕紀念日查看"> 224.    佛曆-日曆農曆節氣 佛誕紀念日查看  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=%E9%9D%88%E6%A9%9F%E5%91%BD%E7%90%86%E9%A4%A8" title="靈機命理館">靈機命理館</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="oms.mmc.fortunetelling.gmpay.almanac2_hd"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaMgowEi4KKG9tcy5tbWMuZm9ydHVuZXRlbGxpbmcuZ21wYXkuYWxtYW5hYzJfaGQQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  日曆：節日假期、農曆節氣、佛曆佛誕紀念日，傳統文化與現代的完美結合。<p>健康一日禪：經典禪語記錄生活</p><p>佛教佛曆，記錄每一天的修行，最精准、最齊全的佛教節日，盡在佛曆</p><p>設計精美、介面友好，是佛友們日常修行的必備軟體</p><p>獨特的“一日禪”功能，讓你每天獲取更多佛教智慧，修心養性，淨化心靈</p><p>全面的佛誕解析，讓你更好地瞭解每一個佛教節日的歷史淵源</p><p>願使用該軟體的眾生都能夠幸福安康!如意吉祥!斷除淫心,早證菩提!</p><p>節日，是人類生活的一種浪漫。不同的國家、不同的民族、不同的宗教乃至不同文化範疇的社會組織都有其不同的節日。人們把對過去美好的記憶賦予節日，也把對未來的美好希望寄託於節日。人們通過節日忘掉過去的得失，面對新的開始。人們以昨天的各種“紀念日”承傳和弘揚人間的浩然正氣，人們開創今天的各種“文化節”促進經濟發展，創造更美好的生活。</p><p>佛教的節日有一個別於其他節日的特點：那就是每個節日都要敬佛佈施。敬佛，是用自己的虔誠恭敬之心向寺廟或家裏的佛菩薩供像敬獻香、花、燈、燭、果、茶等供品；佈施則有兩種內涵：一是佈施僧眾，二是佈施諸己。佈施僧眾，即向僧人及其他貧弱眾生佈施財物和愛心，也叫外布。佛教的“諸己”是指各種不健康的心念或心理。佛教認為，人有幾種不健康的心理就有幾個不同的自我存在，而形成各種不健康的人格。如果把諸多不健康的心都佈施掉了，人們就不會見到自私的人、暴虐的人、狠毒的人、冷酷的人、多疑多妒的人，人就與天地同心同德，有一個健康完美的人格，即是聖人即是佛了。所以“佈施諸己”即是佈施我們自身的怨恨心、急燥心、妒忌心、貪孌心、淫欲心、偷盜心、欺詐心、陷害心、報復心、仇恨心等等，這也叫內佈施。內佈施正是佛教修行的根本。因此，敬佛佈施的內涵和意義不外乎助人思過而已。這“助人思過”有著無限的空間供人們去發揮。這是佛教節日的意義所在。</p><p>曆法的一種。以釋迦牟尼死後一年為紀元元年。《人民日報》1978.11.8：“佛曆以釋迦牟尼死後一年為紀元元年，比世界通用的西曆早五百四十三年。百分之九十以上的居民信奉佛教，因此被人們稱作‘黃袍佛國’的泰國一般使用的曆法就用佛曆。</p><p>十齋日（又稱准提齋）、觀音齋、地藏齋、戒淫保命日期等都已標在日期裏面了；</p><p>六齋日：若逢大月，為農曆每月初八、十四、十五、廿三、廿九、三十日；若逢小月，為農曆每月初八、十四、十五、廿三、廿八、廿九日；</p><p>朔望齋：農曆每月初一、十五日；</p><p>月齋：農曆每年正月、五月、九月等三個月。</p><p>佛曆為部分佛教國家計算紀元的方式，該計算方式以釋迦牟尼去世當年度為計算基準。</p><p>西元1950年，錫蘭首都可倫坡舉辦首屆“世界佛教徒友誼會”，會中議決：佛陀誕生於西元前623年，成道於西元前588年，去世於西元元前543年。三年後的1954年，該年會于緬甸仰光舉行，會中再決議佛教國家以“佛曆”紀元，並以釋迦牟尼涅盤日推算，西元1954年為佛曆2497年。</p><p>世界佛教友誼會於西元一九五零年，在錫蘭可倫坡舉行第一次會議，討論關於佛陀降生、成道，涅槃年代，及出家、成道、涅槃年歲史實。因為南傳與北傳佛教所記載的，各有差異，故作共同規定如下：</p><p>一、佛陀降生於西元前六二三年的五月月圓日；</p><p>二、佛陀出家時是二十九歲，成道時是三十五歲；即西元前五八八年，五月月圓日夜睹明星悟道。</p><p>三、佛陀說法四十五年，八十歲涅槃，即西元前五四三年，五月月圓日夜半入滅。</p><p>四、佛曆是由佛陀涅槃時計算起。</p><p>中國佛教節日主要有哪些？</p><p>一、佛誕節(又稱浴佛節、潑水節、花節)，是紀念釋迦牟尼誕生的節日。漢族定於每年農曆四月初八舉行。傣族定在清明節後十天。</p><p>二、佛圓滿節，是紀念釋迦牟尼逝世的節日，為每年五月中旬月圓日(農曆四月十五日)。</p><p>三、成道節，是紀念釋迦牟尼成道的節日，每年農曆十二月初八舉行。漢族地區的僧尼在十二月八日皆要以米和果物煮粥供佛，俗稱臘八節。</p><p>四、觀音的紀念日，在中國主要有三個：農曆二月十九為觀音誕生；農曆六月十九為觀音成道；農曆九月十九為觀音出家。</p><p>諸佛菩薩聖誕(陰曆)</p><p>正月初一日：彌勒佛聖誕</p><p>正月初六日：定光佛聖誕</p><p>二月初八日：釋迦牟尼佛出家</p><p>二月十五日：釋迦牟尼佛涅盤</p><p>二月十九日：觀世音菩薩聖誕</p><p>二月廿一日：普賢菩薩聖誕</p><p>三月十六日：准提菩薩聖誕</p><p>四月初四日：文殊菩薩聖誕</p><p>四月初八日：釋迦牟尼佛聖誕</p><p>四月十五日：佛吉祥日——釋迦牟尼佛誕生、成道、涅盤三期同一慶(即南傳佛教國家的衛塞節)</p><p>五月十三日：伽藍菩薩聖誕</p><p>六月初三日：護法韋馱尊天菩薩聖誕</p><p>六月十九日：觀世音菩薩成道——此日放生、念佛，功德殊勝</p><p>七月十三日：大勢至菩薩聖誕</p><p>七月廿四日：龍樹菩薩聖誕</p><p>七月三十日：地藏菩薩聖誕</p><p>八月廿二日：燃燈佛聖誕</p><p>九月十九日：觀世音菩薩出家紀念日</p><p>九月三十日：藥師琉璃光如來聖誕</p><p>十月初五日：達摩祖師聖誕</p><p>冬月十七日：阿彌陀佛聖誕</p><p>臘月初八日：釋迦如來成道日</p><p>臘月廿九日：華嚴菩薩聖誕<br>更多生活修行請下載修行者APP，登錄gooleplay搜索修行者即可下載</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> Widget"> 228.    Month Calendar Widget  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Jos%C3%A9+Gonz%C3%A1lez+D'Amico" title="José González D'Amico">José González D'Amico</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.josegd.monthcalwidget"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIwohEh8KGWNvbS5qb3NlZ2QubW9udGhjYWx3aWRnZXQQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  This is a simple calendar widget inspired in the former Calendar from Yahoo! Widgets. It just shows one month at a time, letting you navigate to previous and next months. If you were looking for a simple way to have a month calendar at hand in your Home screen, this widget is for you.<p>NEW IN 1.7.1:<br>Lockscreen extension users will find the widget in the list again<br>Link to extension apps in the Play Store fixed</p><p>BEFORE DOWNLOADING, PLEASE READ THIS:<br>• The calendar in Month Calendar Widget (MCW) is a home screen widget. The screen you'll see when opening the app is not the calendar, it's an introduction screen that tries to explain how to put the widget to work (more details below)<br>• MCW has been published here for more than 3 years. Its main purpose was always to provide a simple way to check dates on the home screen. It was never meant to be a calendar app to manage events. And it's free, and will always be (this is a rule enforced by Google).<br>• Since many people asked for events management, I have published the Calendar Events extension (a paid app). The reason it's a separate download is twofold: 1. People who want a lightweight calendar don't get overwhelmed by features they don't need 2. Making it a paid app helps me justify dedicating effort to continue publishing apps here in the Play Store</p><p>HOW TO USE THE WIDGET<br>First of all, don't try to "open" this calendar. It's a home screen widget, widgets work right on the Android home screen after you place them there. This is the way clock and weather widgets work, for example.<br>The introduction screen has more information. Just tap the "Get started" button to learn more.</p><p>In case you have problems putting MCW to work, please visit the new Google+ community: https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/105494419095577561767</p><p>OK, I GOT IT, I'M USING IT AND I LIKE IT<br>Perfect! Then you can help me by:<br>• Spreading the word about the app: Tell your friends about it, specially in social media: Facebook, Twitter, Google+, etc<br>• Writing a review here: Write a nice review here and 5-star this app ;) (just kidding, be honest about the rating)<br>• Purchasing one of the extensions: You can purchase here on Google Play a Lockscreen extension and now a Calendar Events extension<br>• Making a donation: You can do it from the app's Settings screen or from http://mobiledevjourney.blogspot.com.ar/2012/05/im-accepting-donations.html</p><p>Thanks in advance!</p><p>FEEDBACK<br>If you have problems installing/using the widget, have found a bug or just want to make a feature suggestion, join the Google+ community or drop me an e-mail. I appreciate your feedback. I speak Spanish, English and Portuguese, and usually respond within 24 business hours.<br>You can reach me also on Twitter (http://twitter.com/#!/Jose_GD)</p><p>SOURCE CODE<br>Find Month Calendar VNC Viewer  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=RealVNC+Limited" title="RealVNC Limited">RealVNC Limited</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.realvnc.viewer.android"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJAoiEiAKGmNvbS5yZWFsdm5jLnZpZXdlci5hbmRyb2lkEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  VNC® Viewer is the only remote access app you’ll need. Why? Because…<p>* It’s from RealVNC®, the inventors of VNC remote access and control technology.<br>* We’ve 20 years’ experience making the remote control experience as good as it gets.<br>* There’s no limit to the number of computers you can access, nor how long you can connect in for.<br>* We support the widest range of platforms in the business: www.realvnc.com/products/vnc/tech-specs/#platforms<br>* It’s free to use whether you’re connecting locally or over the Internet (and you won’t see an advert, either).</p><p>Don’t believe us? Check out our reviews! Then check out the hidden costs of other remote access solutions…</p><p>===Getting connected===</p><p>We recommend you try this out at home or in the office first:</p><p>1) Make sure your computer and Android device are connected to the same Wi-Fi-enabled local network.<br>2) Install this app.<br>3) Download VNC 5 to your computer and apply a Free license, or take a 30 day trial of our premium security and performance features.<br>4) Connect!</p><p>When you’re ready to go out and about:</p><p>5) Make sure both computer and Android device are connected to the Internet (for example over 3G, or from a Wi-Fi hotspot).<br>6) Configure the computer’s firewall to enable VNC.<br>7) Configure the computer’s router to forward port 5900.</p><p>For more information on steps 6 and 7, see www.realvnc.com/products/vnc/documentation/latest/getting-connected/</p><p>===Security and privacy===</p><p>When you connect, you’re asked for credentials (this is to protect your computers if you share or lose your Android device). We’re often asked what these are:</p><p>* If you applied a Free license to VNC 5, enter the password you created when you installed it on your computer.<br>* If you applied a paid-for license (or took a trial), enter the username and password you normally use to *log on* to your computer</p><p>We don’t want to hide anything from you, so please note that connections will only be secure (encrypted) if you applied a paid-for license to VNC 5 (or took a trial). Connections to a Free license are fast and responsive, but we hope you’ll understand that end-to-end encryption is a premium feature.</p><p>===How to control===</p><p>Your finger moves the mouse cursor rather than clicking where you touch, as you might expect with a touchscreen. While this may seem counter-intuitive at first, you’ll soon appreciate the fine-grained control it gives you of a high-resolution computer desktop (especially from the small screen of a phone!)</p><p>Mouse operations are performed by gestures. So to double-click, position the mouse cursor appropriately and then tap the screen twice. To see which gestures we’ve mapped to other click, drag, and scroll operations, tap [?] on the toolbar to open the help.</p><p>To type, open the keyboard from the toolbar. Function and other special keys (such as Ctrl, Alt, Delete, and the Cmd key on a Mac) are available from a sliding bar above the keyboard.</p><p>As for the rest: it’s as though you’re sitting in front of your computer! There’s simply no limit to the applications you can run, data you can access, nor operations you can perform…</p><p>===Contact===</p><p>We’d love to hear from you:</p><p>@RealVNC<br>facebook.com/realvnc</p><p>Better still, leave us a review! </p><p>===Trademarks=== </p><p>RealVNC and VNC are trademarks of RealVNC Limited and are protected by trademark registrations and/or pending trademark applications in the European Union, United States of America and other jurisdictions. Find MyHeadset™  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Plantronics+Inc." title="Plantronics Inc.">Plantronics Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.plantronics.findmyheadset"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJwolEiMKHWNvbS5wbGFudHJvbmljcy5maW5kbXloZWFkc2V0EAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Tired of searching for your misplaced Plantronics headset or wondering how much charge is available on your headset’s battery?<p>Most headsets are found under car seats, in pockets, or on a messy desk. For less obvious locations, acoustically locate your headset by sending it a tone so you can hear where it’s hiding. If your headset is out of Bluetooth® range (33ft/10m), or is powered off, then try the BackTrack™ activity log that maps where it was last in use.<br>How to find your headset:<br>•	SEND A TONE: If you think your headset is powered on and within 33ft/10m of your phone, play a sound file through your headset and hear it tell you where it is. You can increase the volume or select an alternate tone from the library to improve your chances of hearing your headset. (Your media audio settings on your phone must be enabled.)<br>•	TRACK IT: If you think your headset is powered off or too far away, review its recent activity on a time-stamped map to discover where your headset was last used. (Your GPS location services on your phone must be enabled.)</p><p>BONUS Battery Meter:<br>If your phone/tablet is running Android OS 3.X, 4.0.X, 4.1.X, 4.2.2*, 4.3 or 4.4 and it is paired and connected to any of the following Plantronics headsets, an on-screen headset battery meter icon will appear in your device’s Status Bar and a talk-time estimate for your headset will be included in your Notifications list. Compatible headsets include:<br>  Voyager Edge<br>  Voyager Edge UC<br>  Voyager Legend<br>  Voyager Legend UC<br>  Voyager PRO HD<br>  Voyager PRO UC<br>  Marque 2 M165<br>  Marque 2 M180<br>  Marque 2 A170<br>  Marque M155<br>  Savor M1100<br>  Explorer 10<br>  Explorer 50<br>  M90 Series<br>  M70 Series<br>  M55<br>  M25 Series<br>  BackBeat FIT<br>  BackBeat PRO<br>  BackBeat GO<br>  BackBeat GO2<br>  Blackwire C710/C720<br>*NOTE – Battery status is not available for the following Android versions. However, all other features of the Find MyHeadset app will work with those phones/tablets:<br> <br>•	Samsung Galaxy S4 phones running Android OS 4.2.2 <br>•	Any phones/tablets running below Android OS 3.0 <br>•	Any phone or tablet running Android OS 4.2 or 4.2.1 <br>•	Some phones or tablets running Android OS 4.4</p><p>Support &amp; Feedback:<br>NEED MORE HELP? For technical support or questions, visit http://www.plantronics.com/us/support/<br>SHARE YOUR IDEAS: We love hearing your feedback. Mercury 安卓版瀏覽器秉承了 Mercury 追求卓越品質的一貫精神, 其精簡, 迅捷的使用體驗和人性化設計的各個功能將會讓您充分享受精彩的互聯網生活.<p>迅捷瀏覽 - 多種功能輔助您更快的瀏覽和搜索, 如: 廣告攔截, Flash 支持, 自定義搜索引擎, 批量下載圖片, 批量社交分享, 多標籤頁支持, 用戶代理, 離線閱讀列表, 無圖模式, 全屏瀏覽等. 盡享極速瀏覽和便捷操作<br>強大功能 - 自由的控制與設置, 讓您將復雜的工作簡單化, 如: 手勢控制, 書籤和文件的跨平台同步, 文件管理與傳輸, 白天和夜間模式的手動與自動切換,亮度和字體的調整, 精美的主題, 可自定義的菜單, 以及多種功能強大的插件. 都會讓您的使用, 效率倍增<br>安全保護 - 諸多安全功能保護您的個人隱私不被洩露. 如: 隱私模式, 密碼鎖, 歷史&amp; cookie 一鍵清除等. 瀏覽器使用記錄和隱私信息360度保護, 使您高枕無憂</p><p>應用特性:</p><p>★ Flash 支持 - 支持 Flash 播放, 視頻播放更順暢<br>★ 廣告攔截 - 內置強大的廣告攔截規則, 消滅條幅/ 全屏/ 彈窗廣告, 更快瀏覽, 更省流量<br>★ 隱私模式 - 開啟後, 將不記錄您的瀏覽歷史和 cookie，瀏覽信息將會被充分保護<br>★ 密碼鎖 - 通過密碼保護, 不讓陌生人打開瀏覽器, 瀏覽信息只對自己可見<br>★ 一鍵清除 - 任何時候都可以手動一鍵清除瀏覽記錄和 cookie 信息, 杜絕一切被偷窺隱私的可能性<br>★ 手勢控制 - 近10種手勢, 自由配置10餘種功能, 不必點來點去, 輕鬆一劃, 即可實現<br>★ 自定義搜索引擎 - 不僅內置20餘種常用的搜索引擎, 還可以自己添加個性化的搜索引擎<br>★ 書籤同步 - 不僅可以在 Android / iOS 平台自動同步書籤, 還可以和桌面 Chrome / Firefox 自由同步, 也可手動導入/ 導出書籤<br>★ 文件同步 - 支持連接 Dropbox / Google Drive / OneDrive / Box 等流行網盤, 方便管理所有下載文件<br>★ 文件管理 - 內置文檔 / 圖片/ 音頻 / 視頻的分類和播放, 視頻播放器支持所有您能想到的視頻類型<br>★ 文件傳輸 - 除了原始的數據線傳輸外, 還支持通過 Wifi 直接傳輸, 更可通過郵件 / 短信 / 藍牙等分享方式將文件分享出去<br>★ 白天 / 夜間模式 / 自動夜間模式 - 不僅可以手動切換白天 / 夜間模式, 還可以設置時間範圍自動切換, 護眼更便捷<br>★ 亮度調整 / 字體調整 - 支持大幅度調整亮度和字體, 各類人士均可方便的設置後, 舒適的使用<br>★ 精美主題 - 內置多套主題, 滿足界面控的需求<br>★ 批量下圖 - 經常瀏覽美圖網站人士的福音, 使用畫廊模式可以一鍵批量下載頁面上的所有圖片<br>★ 批量分享 - 分享控的福音, 支持十餘種熱門社交平台的帳號綁定, 支持一鍵批量發送和定時發送, 還可以查看歷史分享記錄<br>★ 多標籤頁 - 支持通過前台 / 後台方式打開多個標籤瀏覽網頁, 快速瀏覽, 盡收眼底<br>★ 用戶代理 - 支持移動版和桌面版頁面的切換, 還可偽裝成 Androd 或是 iOS 設備<br>★ 閱讀列表 - 添加到閱讀列表稍後閱讀, 支持離線存儲, 更省流量的閱讀, 更純淨的閱讀頁面<br>★ 無圖模式 - 支持無圖瀏覽模式, 更快的頁面加載, 更節省流量<br>★ 全屏瀏覽 - 支持全屏 / 非全屏模式的切換, 瀏覽方式由您做主<br>★ 自定義菜單 - 個性化菜單, 20餘種功能, 支持自定義配搭<br>★ 快捷入口 - 可以開啟通知欄入口, 更快捷的使用搜索引擎<br>★ 插件 - 內置10餘種實用插件, 人性化功能使您的上網更加便捷<br>★ 設計風格 - 目標是最新最酷的 Material Design, 敬請各位 Android 控批評指正<br>★ 由於商店描述字數限制, 無法一一列舉, 更多實用功能, 等您來發現</p><p><br>關於 Mercury 瀏覽器</p><p>Mercury 瀏覽器由 iLegendsoft, Inc 榮譽出品。因我們在 iOS 領域多年孜孜不倦的努力，Mercury 瀏覽器如今譽滿全球並已擁有數千萬固定用戶。您可在此了解更多關於 Mercury 瀏覽器的信息： http://mercury-browser.com<br>電子郵件聯繫方式： 儲存所有項目。隨時隨地存取。<p>WD My Cloud 應用程式可讓您安全地存取儲存在您 WD 個人雲端儲存裝置以及雲端儲存服務中的檔案，現在還多了 WD My Passport Wireless。</p><p>WD My Cloud 应用允许您通过 WD 个人云、云服务和 My Passport Wireless 查看照片、观看视频、播放音乐和访问文件。这款简单易用的应用通过直接上传照片和视频释放移动设备的空间，并可以在您的所有云存储解决方案内传输文件。现在有了专门的搜索标签，精确找到想要的照片、视频或音乐播放菜单再也不是难事。找出特定的文件更迅捷无比。</p><p>透過本簡單好用的應用程式，您只需登入您的雲端服務帳戶或 WD 個人雲端儲存裝置，就能存取您的所有重要檔案。至於 WD My Passport Wireless，只需透過其個人無線網路直接連線，就能存取您的所有檔案。</p><p>適用於以下 WD 個人雲端儲存產品：<br>-	WD My Cloud<br>-	WD My Cloud Mirror<br>-	WD My Cloud EX2<br>-	WD My Cloud EX4<br>-	WD My Book Live<br>-	WD My Book Live Duo<br>-	WD My Net N900 Central<br>-	WD My Passport Wireless</p><p>以及下列雲端服務：<br>-	Dropbox<br>-	Google Drive<br>-	OneDrive</p><p>特點：<br>-	使用行動裝置即可存取相片、音樂、影片和文件。<br>-	直接從您行動裝置的相機相簿上傳相片和影片。<br>-	下載檔案以便離線存取。<br>-	使用電子郵件連結分享一或多個檔案。<br>-	檔案管理 － 複製、移動、重新命名和刪除檔案。</p><p>需求：<br>-	針對雲端服務存取：有效的 Dropbox、Google 雲端硬碟或 OneDrive 帳戶。<br>-	針對個人雲端儲存裝置存取：WD My Cloud、WD My Cloud Mirror、WD My Cloud EX2/4、WD My Book Live、WD My Book Live Duo 或 WD My Net N900 Central 並搭配最新韌體。<br>-	針對無線儲存裝置存取：WD My Passport Wireless 並搭配最新韌體。</p><p>在 Facebook 上幫我們按「讚」：facebook.com/WesternDigital<br>在 Twitter 上追蹤我們：@WesternDigital</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a This, in most cases, accelerate notoriously frame rates offering a better and smooth gameplay since it's put in full priority.</p><p>★ MEMORY CLEANER<br>Release memory whenever you want. Remote Control Collection  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Steppschuh" title="Steppschuh">Steppschuh</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.steppschuh.remotecontrolcollection"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaMAouEiwKJmNvbS5zdGVwcHNjaHVoLnJlbW90ZWNvbnRyb2xjb2xsZWN0aW9uEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Use your Android device as a remote for your Windows PC - Control the mouse, keyboard, media, presentations and more!<br>The Remote Control Collection is a compilation of remotes, which you can use to wirelessly control your Windows PC. The unified remotes enable you to control the PC beyond mouse and keyboard!<br><br><p>What others say:<br>DotTech.org:<br>Very responsive and very convenient to use</p><p>Chip.de:<br>Solid application with brilliant simplicity</p><p>UnlockPWD.com:<br>There are many remotes out there, this one is on another level</p><p>Android-User.de:<br>Setting up this app is a no-brainer</p><p>TomsGuide.com:<br>Top app for controlling your PC<br><br></p><p>Included remote controls are:<br>-Mouse<br>-Keyboard<br>-Live Screen (Pro)<br>-Media Player (Pro)<br>-Slideshows (Pro)<br>-Speech Recognition<br><br></p><p>Mouse Remote<br>Imagine your PC’s touchpad right on your Android device. Multitouch gestures like scrolling and zooming are supported. You can toggle the keyboard to send keys at the same time.</p><p>Keyboard Remote<br>Use the physical or virtual Android keyboard to type characters and they will appear on your PC. Important keys like Windows, Escape and Control are also available.</p><p>Live Screen Remote<br>See your PC's screen live right on your Android device and control the mouse in real time. </p><p>Media Remote<br>Control the media player of your choice! Supported are Windows Media Player, iTunes, VLC, Media Monkey, Songbird and more.</p><p>Slideshow Remote<br>Control your slideshows directly from your smartphone! The screen of your PC will be transmitted to your smartphone in real time! That works with Powerpoint, Impress and Adobe Reader, Windows Media Center and more.</p><p>Speech recognition<br>Simply say what you want to be typed on your PC. You can also use voice commands to control your PC's media, e.g. "skip this track" or "turn the volume up".</p><p>Android Wear Support<br>You can now control your PC directly from your wrist! Super handy for presentations or controlling a media player.</p><p>Much more<br>The Remote Control Server is open source and can be used to control any device in your network. You can use this app to control all your internet of things (IOT) ready devices - like Arduino, Raspberry Pi and so on.<br></p><p>To receive the commands from the Remote Control App, you will need the Remote Control Server. You can download it for free from:<br>http://server.android-remote.com</p><p>If you have trouble setting up a connection, follow this step-by-step guide or watch the video tutorial at: <br>http://setup.android-remote.com/</p><p>Facebook fans can test the pro version for free:<br>http://facebook.com/RemoteControlApps<br></p><p>Permissions:<br>Network communication<br>For creating network sockets and using custom network protocols to connect with the pc.</p><p>Phone calls<br>Is needed to create a unique device id. Used to verify purchases and register unlock codes.</p><p>Vibration<br>For haptic feedback.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=net.juniper.junos.pulse.android" title="Junos Pulse"> 250.    Junos Pulse  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Juniper+Networks+Inc.+and+Affiliates" title="Juniper Networks Inc. and Affiliates">Juniper Networks Inc. and Affiliates</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="net.juniper.junos.pulse.android"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKQonEiUKH25ldC5qdW5pcGVyLmp1bm9zLnB1bHNlLmFuZHJvaWQQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Important Information:<p>JunOS Pulse is the deprecated client from Pulse Secure, please migrate from to the new Pulse Secure Client</p><p>For information related to notable changes while migrating from Junos Pulse to Pulse Secure Client, please refer to http://kb.juniper.net/KB29722</p><p><br>JUNOS PULSE FOR ANDROID – APP DESCRIPTION</p><p>Secure your Android-based mobile life with Juniper Networks® Junos® Pulse! Junos Pulse secures connectivity to your corporate web-based applications via Juniper  Networks SSL VPN gateways. And, Junos Pulse delivers mobile security, to protect your Android devices from mobile malware, viruses, and spyware, as well as from device loss or theft, preventing device damage, and loss and exploitation of sensitive user or corporate data. Junos Pulse secures mobility by combining secure enterprise connectivity with comprehensive mobile security and device management. </p><p>REQUIREMENTS: <br>1. Juniper Networks SA Series SSL VPN Appliances or MAG Series Junos Pulse Gateways running Junos Pulse Secure Access Service.  For more information about supported gateways and Android versions, please read the Supported Platforms guide at:  http://www.juniper.net/support/products/pulse/mobile/<br>2. Junos Pulse Mobile Security Suite, which is required to activate and enforce comprehensive mobile security and device management. </p><p>Check with your IT department to ensure that your network is ready for Junos Pulse! </p><p>FEATURES: <br>• Safe, secure access to web-based applications, enterprise networks, and bookmarks via an encrypted SSL tunnel between the app and the SSL VPN gateway. Users can access bookmarks enabled on the SSL VPN gateway. <br>• Secure access to corporate email through Outlook Web Access. <br>• Real-time antivirus protection using heuristic on-device scanning of all stored, incoming or outgoing  files via any input/output means, and Secure Digital (SD) card content.<br>• Background scanning of all network traffic and interfaces for malware, viruses and spyware. <br>• Anti-theft/Anti-loss protection, including support to remotely locate, track (via GPS), lock, wipe, or sound alert on a lost or stolen device. <br>• Remote commands to alert and take action (remote device lock and/or wipe), or to track a device on detecting a change in or removal of SIM card. <br>• Backup and restore of contacts and calendar events stored on your device. <br>• Granular, centralized security policy administration and configuration for IT administrators. <br>• Purpose-built for mobile devices, with minimal CPU, battery and memory usage. </p><p>SUPPORT: <br>Follow this link below for an FAQ on support policies for Junos Pulse for Google Android. <br>http://kb.juniper.net/InfoCenter/index?page=content&amp;id=KB19298</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" QuickEdit 文本編輯器  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Rhythm+Software" title="Rhythm Software">Rhythm Software</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0"  <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  QuickEdit是Android上的高效，穩定和全功能的文字編輯器。它同時為手機和平板設備進行了優化。<p>功能：</p><p>* 增強型的記事本應用，包含大量增強和升級。<br>* 代碼編輯器，可為超過40種的程式設計語言進行語法高亮。<br>* 高性能，即時的回饋，可以在處理大型文字檔(超過10,000行)時流暢編輯。<br>* 顯示或者隱藏行號。<br>* 可以撤銷或者重做更改，而且無次數限制。<br>* 顯示行縮進，並可以方便的添加或減少縮進。<br>* 高效的選擇和編輯功能。<br>* 同時支援橫向和縱向的捲軸，可以兩方向平滑滾動。<br>* 可以直接跳轉到指定的行號。<br>* 快速的查詢和替換字串。<br>* 輕鬆選擇和輸入顏色代碼。<br>* 自動檢測檔編碼格式。<br>* 支援更改檔編碼格式。<br>* 可以從最近打開或添加的清單中挑選檔。<br>* 同時支援淺色調和深色調兩種主題。<br>* 同時為手機和平板設備進行了優化。</p><p>QuickEdit文字編輯器包含了大量性能和使用者體驗方面的優化，它的速度和輸入回饋更加優越。你可以使用它作為標準的文字編輯器或者代碼編輯器。</p><p>你如果有任何問題或建議，歡迎聯繫我們：support@rhmsoft.com</p><p>你也可以把你的評論添加到QuickEdit在xda-developers的主題：<br>HTTP://forum.xda-developers.com/android/apps-games/app-quickedit-text-editor-t2899385</p><p>感謝你使用QuickEdit！</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.sec.android.sidesync30" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.sec.android.sidesync30" title="SideSync 3.0"> 253.    SideSync 3.0  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Samsung+Electronics+co.,ltd" title="Samsung Electronics co.,ltd">Samsung Electronics co.,ltd</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.sec.android.sidesync30"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJAoiEiAKGmNvbS5zZWMuYW5kcm9pZC5zaWRlc3luYzMwEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  SideSync is a new PC-Mobile solution that enables screens, windows, and data to be shared easily. Share between a PC and a Galaxy smartphone, or between a Galaxy Tab and Galaxy smartphone.<p>You can see exactly the same screen displayed on your smartphone or tablet on the other device. Then drag and drop files, type text messages on your keyboard, and much more.</p><p>■ Instructions<br> 1. Install SideSync 3.0 on your PC and your Android device.<br>   - PC: SideSync is pre-installed<br>     (http://www.samsung.com/sidesync/)<br>   - Android device: install SideSync 3.0 app<br> 2. Run the software on your PC and your Android device.<br>   - PC: run SideSync 3.0<br>   - Android device: run SideSync 3.0 app<br> 3. Connect your Android device to your PC with a USB cable or connect the devices to the same Wi-Fi network.<br> <br>Mode 1) Keyboard &amp; Mouse Sharing<br>In Keyboard &amp; Mouse Sharing mode you can use an Android device as an extra monitor and easily control it with your PC's mouse and keyboard.<br>In SideSync Settings, set the location of the Android device, and then move the mouse cursor across so it appears on the Android device's screen.<br>The cursor will appear on the Android device enabling you to control it with the mouse and keyboard without having to touch the screen. If you want to operate the PC again, move the cursor across to the PC monitor and carry on as usual.<br>Now, try using both the mobile device and the PC simultaneously.<br> * This mode is available when a Galaxy smartphone is connected to a PC.</p><p>Mode 2) Phone Screen Sharing<br>Phone Screen Sharing mode allows you to view the screen of the Android device on your PC monitor. Use the virtual screen via your PC to control your Android device.<br>SideSync enables you to control the size of the virtual screen and avoids overlapping the windows of other programs.<br> * This mode is available when a Galaxy smartphone is connected to a PC or a Galaxy Tab.</p><p>■ Supported PCs<br> - All PCs (OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8)<br>■ Supported Android Devices<br> - All Samsung Android devices with a supported OS (Galaxy smartphones, tablets)<br> · Supported Android OS: KitKat and above<br>■ Supported Models<br> - Galaxy Note 3, Galaxy S5, Galaxy S4(*)<br> - Galaxy NotePro (12.2), Galaxy TabPro (8.4/10.1/12.2), Galaxy Tab 4 (8.0/10.1)<br> · * Some devices will follow later.<br>■ Restrictions<br> - When you are using Note2 NE6 version, please update your phone with latest firmware.<br> - Note3, S3, S4 does not support Drag&amp;Drop file transfer function.<br> - Some features that use NFC, sensors in smart phones will not work in mirrored tablet or PC.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.sec.android.sidesync30" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> class="details"> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=net.phlam.android.clockworktomato" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=net.phlam.android.clockworktomato" title="發條番茄鐘"> 254.    發條番茄鐘  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=phlam" title="phlam">phlam</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="net.phlam.android.clockworktomato"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKwopEicKIW5ldC5waGxhbS5hbmRyb2lkLmNsb2Nrd29ya3RvbWF0bxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  發條番茄鐘是一個用於時間管理的應用程序，它基於"番茄鐘工作法"，這種方法將工作時間分割成時長為25 分鐘的片段，並間隔中短暫的休息，從而達到提高效率的目的。<p>此應用程序既是一個計時器也是一個桌面時鐘，它具有簡明而完整的功能：<br>• 所有信息的直觀展示：通過一個簡潔而美觀的時鐘來顯示開始時間、結束時間、當前計時器的進度以及下一個計時器<br>• 計時器可以自動繼續<br>• 增加手動“延長計時”模式<br>• 在番茄鐘計時器運行時持續發出滴答聲<br>• 在計時器結束時和延時的計時器運行時閃爍螢幕<br>• 主螢幕的時鍾小工具<br>• 鎖定界面的時鍾小工具（Android 4.2+）<br>• 對已完成的番茄鐘進行統計，並具有分享歷史記錄的功能<br>• 高度可定制化（定時器時長、界面顏色、元件顯示）<br>• 通過調用Tasker任務進一步增強可定制性<br>• 對包括平板電腦在內的大小螢幕都進行了優化<br>• 系統資源佔用低<br>• 沒有不合理的權限要求：<br>READ_PHONE_STATE（讀取通話狀態）用來檢測通話狀態並相應地暫停滴答聲。<br>WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG​​E（寫入外部存儲器）用來存儲和讀取自定義通知鈴聲。<br>• 沒有廣告</p><p>如果您對於程序的功能有任何建議，歡迎與我們聯繫。<br>如果您願意幫助翻譯發條番茄鐘，請點擊以下鏈接：<br>https://crowdin.net/project/clockwork-tomato<br>Russian translation by Мильтов Евгений.<br>Simplified Chinese translation by 鲁喆.<br>German translation by Marcus Hoja and Hans Nix.<br>Spanish translation by Miguel Pagola.<br>Korean translation by 태윤.<br>Turkish translation by Can Garip.<br>Polish translation by Mariusz Klochowicz.</p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=net.phlam.android.clockworktomato" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> 2.3的使用者可以於桌面上長按，選擇桌面小工具後可以找到「Yes!隨身Note」的項目，新增至桌面就可以開始使用了；Android 4.0以後的使用者請由「小工具」標籤中尋找。</p><p>有任何意見或是問題歡迎來信指教。</p><p>※ 國筆輸入法，介面簡潔，操作簡單，無需學習，安裝即可使用。同時專注於提升基本的輸入體驗，輸入速度快，預測精准。致力於打造最簡潔、專業的手機輸入法。<p>輸入法特色：<br>獨創的手寫介面，既可在全屏寫字，又可點擊到輸入法外面的按鍵。<br>筆劃模式，首創快捷部首功能，點擊次數更少，輸入速度更快。<br>隨意調整鍵盤位置、大小，再大屏的手機，也能單手輸入。<br>更換佈局功能，根據您的操作習慣，選擇適合您的佈局。</p><p>主要功能：<br>支援注音、倉頡、筆劃、手寫等繁體中文模式。<br>支援拼音、筆劃、全屏手寫等簡體中文模式。<br>支援語音輸入。<br>內嵌豐富的Emoji表情。<br>換膚功能，選擇您喜歡的主題。<br>調節鍵盤高度，可以將鍵盤調節到點擊最舒適的高度。<br>混合輸入功能，輸入數位、符號無需切換。<br>記憶功能，輸入的片語自動記憶。<br>智慧容錯，誤按也能正確輸入。<br>簡繁轉換，將簡體中文轉換為繁體中文。<br>提供地方資訊詞庫，目前可下載廣州和上海詞庫。</p><p>安裝國筆輸入法，每天簽到送流量。<br>活動規則：<br>1.每天可通過國筆輸入法登錄WO+個人中心，成功簽到獲贈3次抽獎機會。<br>2.每次100%中獎，最低1M流量，最高100M流量。<br>3.每天登陸WO+中心獲得的抽獎機會，當日沒用完可累計日後使用。<br>4.獲贈流量的查詢：流量即時贈送到WO+個人中心的流量子帳戶中，由於網路原因贈送時間可能會有幾小時延遲，流量帳戶餘額以查詢時的實際頁面為准。<br>5.獲贈流量的領取：按照WO+個人中心流量帳戶領取規則，廣東聯通手機號碼帳戶餘額累計滿30M即可領用，每月每個帳號可領用一次；非廣東聯通手機號碼按照WO+規則可以轉贈流量給廣東聯通手機號碼。</p><p></p><p></p> 使用 SanDisk Connect™ 無線閃存驅動器應用程式享受智慧型手機、平板電腦、個人電腦和 Mac 無線儲存、共享和傳送內容的自由。 <p>********   該應用程式需要配備 SanDisk Connect™ 無線閃存驅動器設備以便工作。    ********</p><p>只需將您的移動設備無線連接到無線驅動器，就可在房屋周圍或行走時立即存取電影、照片、音樂和文檔，同時避免常見的線纜干擾、連接限制或網際網路可用性等問題。 </p><p>主要功能： </p><p>無線閃存驅動器應用程式<br>•	透過移動設備上的無線閃存驅動器，可無線存取和儲存無線閃存驅動器上的電影、照片、音樂和文檔。無需網際網路或路由器連接。<br>•	直接從驅動器傳送媒體內容 <br>•	將移動設備照片、視頻和其他文件上傳到驅動器，釋放移動設備空間。<br>•	透過驅動器，將文件下載到移動設備進行本地存取。 <br>•	照片幻燈顯示模式<br>•	自動播放目錄中的所有音頻文件<br>•	預覽應用程式或其他應用程式中的文檔<br>•	左右滑動方便瀏覽內容 <br>•	查看模式：列表、平鋪 </p><p><br>關於 SanDisk Connect™ 無線閃存驅動器設備（另行銷售）<br>•	透過 Wi-Fi (802.11 b/g/n) 無線工作，不要求網際網路或路由器<br>•	可擴展儲存容量<br>•	最多同時連接 8 台設備，向最多 3 台設備傳送視頻 <br>•	單次充電最長 4 小時連續流傳送 <br>•	有效距離 45.72 米（150 英尺）<br>•	Wi-Fi 密碼保護 (WPA2)2<br>•	欲瞭解更多關於無線閃存驅動器的資訊，請點擊 www.sandiskconnect.com</p><p>注意：驅動器適用於所有文件類型。然而，電影和音樂等內容的傳送取決於您的設備支援的文件類型。 </p><p><br>支援<br>如有任何疑問，請登錄 SanDisk 的技術支援頁面，網址：www.sandisk.com/support </p><p><br>公司資訊<br>SanDisk 是在美國和其他國家註冊的商標。SanDisk class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.devuni.flashlight.fastlight" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.devuni.flashlight.fastlight" title="TF: 快光"> 267.    TF: 快光  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Nikolay+Ananiev" title="Nikolay Ananiev">Nikolay Ananiev</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.devuni.flashlight.fastlight"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKQonEiUKH2NvbS5kZXZ1bmkuZmxhc2hsaWdodC5mYXN0bGlnaHQQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  快光是 Tiny Flashlight 的一個插件，並且依賴于Tiny Flashlight。<p>快光通過3種不同的方式讓您快速便捷地訪問您的閃光燈：</p><p>* 在鎖屏上搖動<br>* 在鎖屏上語音命令<br>* 持續通知</p><p><br>在鎖屏上搖動：<br>================<br>* 在嘗試使用該功能前，您必須已經擁有屏幕鎖。若還沒有，請打開“設備設置-&gt; 安全-&gt;屏幕鎖”，然後選擇一個。<br>* 人臉識別解鎖可能會存在問題，因為相機會干擾閃光燈功能<br>* 從快燈啟用鎖屏搖動<br>* 按電源按鈕關閉屏幕<br>* 再次按電源按鈕顯示鎖屏 –切勿解鎖設備<br>* 搖動</p><p>自定義鎖屏應用（從市場下載的）：<br>================<br>自定義鎖屏與一般鎖屏不同。目前，快光支持以下自定義鎖屏應用：</p><p>* GO Locker<br>* WidgetLocker<br>* MagicLocker</p><p><br>超時設置和意外啟動<br>================<br>快光使用一種先進的搖動檢測算法，但仍然有可能會出現假正值。最常出現的燈光意外啟動發生在用戶在步行時將設備放在口袋中並且按下了電源按鈕時。若未設置超時值，電池消耗會非常快。建議超時值為20秒。</p><p><br>鎖屏語音<br>================<br>* 該功能可以在安卓2.2或者更新版本上使用<br>* 在嘗試使用該功能前，您必須已經擁有屏幕鎖。若還沒有，請打開“設備設置-&gt; 安全-&gt;屏幕鎖”，然後選擇一個。<br>* 人臉識別解鎖可能會存在問題，因為相機會干擾閃光燈功能<br>* 閱讀上述部份的自定義鎖屏和鎖屏搖動中的超時設置信息。<br>* 從快燈啟用鎖屏語音<br>* 按電源按鈕關閉屏幕<br>* 再次按電源按鈕顯示鎖屏 –切勿解鎖設備<br>* 您可以說出以下命令<br>- “燈光”<br>- “手電筒”</p><p>*	很快會添加額外的語言。</p><p>若您使用的是安卓4.0或者更舊的版本：<br>================<br>語音識別要求擁有活躍的網路連接。您可以通過以下方法更改語言：設備設置 -&gt; 語音輸入&amp;輸出-&gt;語音識別器設置</p><p>若您使用的是安卓4.1或者更新版本：<br>================<br>您可以為大多數受歡迎語言安裝一個語言包，這樣的話，語音識別就不再要求有活躍的網路連接。</p><p>若要更改語言：<br>設備設置 -&gt; 語言 &amp; 輸入 -&gt; 語言</p><p>若要安裝語言包：<br>設備設置 -&gt; 語言&amp; 輸入 -&gt; 向下滾動 -&gt; 語音搜索 -&gt; 離線語音識別</p><p><br>持續提醒：<br>================<br>持續提醒功能可以讓您從任何地方切換燈光，只要提醒欄可用。這是一個額外選項，會在燈亮時顯示電池使用情況和剩餘時間（僅在擁有相機閃光燈的設備上）。使用電池使用情況功能時，您必須對其進行校準。校準方法如下：</p><p>讓燈光持續亮5-10分鐘以獲得最大的精確度。確保設備未處於充電狀態。出現首個數據后，不可以關閉燈光。燈光持續開啟時間越長，精確度便越高。必須一次完成。</p><p><br>閱讀手機狀態許可：<br>================<br>該許可用於在設備開始響鈴時停止燈光，或者防止在通話時開啟燈光。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> Chinese Keyboard Plugin  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Honso" title="Honso">Honso</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="klye.hanwriting"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGQoXEhUKD2tseWUuaGFud3JpdGluZxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Chinese Plugin for Honso Keyboards.<p>Please also install O Keyboard &nbsp;or Multiling Keyboard</p><p>Chinese hanzi, Japanese kanji hiragana katakana, Korean hangul hanja, English. (HanWriting IME)<br>please email or use google group for bug reports.<br>https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/multiling-keyboard</p><p>拼音 pinyin, 注音 zhuyin and 粵拼 Jyutping, 速成 also supported by this plugin (enable it under language option)</p><p>建議或報告錯誤，請電郵或google group（看上面），謝謝！<br>請閱讀介紹和常見問題。 http://goomoji.appspot.com/market/ml.html</p><p>沒有網絡權限，更沒有奇奇怪怪的權限，可以放心使用。</p><p>手寫輸入特點功能：<br>★偏旁找字:<br>當你忘了一些字怎麼寫，或懶得寫全字，偏旁找字讓你只寫某個偏旁然後找字。</p><p>苟→敬→驚,璥,檠,警<br>臣→臧→藏<br>地→哋,逇<br>既→嘅,慨,概,鱀<br>予→野→墅,嘢<br>川→訓→瞓<br>可→哥→歌,戨,鎶,謌,彁<br>龙→龍→龖,龘<br>壴→喜,囍<br>宑→塞,賽<br>爻→學,斅<br>角→觸,嘴</p><p>★生僻字： <br>MultiLing幾乎支持所有漢字，android 系統不包含字除外。<br>你可以任意輸入中日韓漢字、生僻名字、網絡火星文(巭孬嫑)。</p><p>比如三國演義裏的名字:<br>嘏肜矍傕諶粲悌昶毗荀顗嶷邕琰羕彧嵇毌胄巽伷</p><p>★寫簡得繁:</p><p>边→邊<br>体→體<br>龙→龍<br>专→转→轉<br>个→個→嗰<br>合→翕→噏<br>让→讓</p><p>同音轉換:</p><p>如果 提筆忘字, Multiling 讓你寫同音字/詞. 支持普通話和粵語同音.</p><p>介決→解決<br>堆措→對錯<br>皮視→鄙視</p><p>速寫:</p><p>MultiLing手寫雖然不支持草書，但是它有另一套的速寫功能。請看連接圖片：<br>http://goomoji.appspot.com/market/stroke.png</p><p>所以『口,日,白,勹 』等偏旁只需一筆就能完成。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=AutomateIt.mainPackage" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=AutomateIt.mainPackage" title="AutomateIt - Smart Automation"> 269.    AutomateIt - Smart Automation  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=SmarterApps+Ltd" title="SmarterApps Ltd">SmarterApps Ltd</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="AutomateIt.mainPackage"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFkF1dG9tYXRlSXQubWFpblBhY2thZ2UQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  ★★★ Over 500,000 downloads! ★★★<br>AutomateIt is designed to make your life easier by automating various tasks on your Android smartphone or tablet.<p>Define a set of your desired behaviors in response to events on your Android device.<br>Each behavior/rule is defined as a pair of Trigger-Action listed below.</p><p>"If you need your phone to adopt some autonomy, you can’t go wrong here" - www.androidpolice.com<br>"sometimes I’d like my phone to do stuff all on its own. It’s an Android after all" - www.androidapps.com<br>"AutomateIt Is a Simple and Free Android Automation Tool" - www.lifehacker.com<br>"It's truly an amazing app" - www.androidpit.com</p><p>AutomateIt provides a default set of useful rules to get you started:<br>Low battery warning<br>Quiet at night<br>Normal sound mode at morning<br>Max volume when headset unplugged<br>Lower volume when headset plugged<br>Unmute by SMS</p><p>Triggers:<br>• Any SMS Trigger - Triggers on SMS received<br>• SMS With Text Trigger - Triggers on receipt of SMS Message with a specific text<br>• Battery Level Trigger - Triggers on a defined battery level<br>• Bluetooth State Enabled/Disabled<br>• Bluetooth Device Connected - Any device or specific device<br>• Incoming/Hang Call - Any call or from a specific contact<br>• Headset Plugged/Unplugged Trigger<br>• Location Trigger - Arriving/Exiting a defined region<br>• External Power Connected/Disconnected<br>• Screen On/Off<br>• Wi-Fi Enabled/Disabled<br>• Connected to Wi-Fi network - Any network or a specific network<br>• Time Trigger - recurring time events<br>• GPS Enabled Changed - GPS Activated/Deactivated and started/stopped looking for current location<br>• SMS from contact<br>• USB Connected/Disconnected Trigger<br>• Airplane Mode Activated/Deactivated<br>• Dock State Trigger - Docked to Car/Desk<br>• Application Status Trigger - Triggers when selected application activated or deactivated<br>• Outgoing call - all calls or calling specific contact<br>• Sound Mode Changed to Silent/Vibrate/Normal<br>• Boot Trigger - triggers on device startup (assuming service starts on boot)<br>• Manual Trigger - Requires user explicit execution of this trigger<br>• Cell ID Trigger - Trigger when connecting or disconnecting from defined cellular cells<br>• NFC Trigger - use NFC tags to launch rules<br>• Weather Trigger - Monitor weather at your location<br>• Mobile Data State Trigger<br>• Activity Recognition - an EXPERIMENTAL trigger that detects when you are in a car, on a bicycle, on foot or standing still</p><p>Actions:<br>• Notification - Shows notification on notification bar<br>• Play Sound - Plays selected sound<br>• Set Bluetooth State - Enabled/Disabled<br>• Set Sound Mode - Silent / Vibrate / Normal (With/Without Vibrate)<br>• Set Speakerphone State - Turn on/off<br>• Set Volume - Sets volume of all streams or a specific stream<br>• Set Wi-Fi Adapter State - Enabled/Disabled<br>• Start Application<br>• Enable/Disable other rules<br>• Vibrate action<br>• Enable/Disable Data Connectivity action - [NOT supported on some devices - see why on developer website]<br>• Kill Application [Requires Root - see why on developer website]<br>• Launch Home Screen<br>• Activate/Deactivate Airplane mode [Supported for Android version prior to 4.2 and all rooted devices]<br>• Enable/Disable GPS [Supported for Android version prior to 2.3 and all rooted devices]<br>• Enable/Disable Sync<br>• Set Mobile Data - Enable/Disable Mobile Data<br>• Set Screen Brightness - Automatic or specific value<br>• Enable/Disable screen automatic rotation<br>• Dial Phone Number<br>• Send SMS to phone number<br>• Set screen timeout (Including "Never" turn off)<br>• Shutdown device [Requires Root]<br>• Text-to-Speech - Say defined text<br>• Reboot [Requires Root]<br>• Set Wallpaper - set your home screen wallpaper</p><p>Want to AutomateIt with your own language? visit http://goo.gl/qpDoI.<br>Supports English, German, Spanish, Hebrew, Polish, Danish, French, Italian, Czech, Slovak, Romanian, Chinese, Hungarian, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Dutch and Russian</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target"
