271.    高效Todo(备忘 提醒 日程 记事)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Icy.Zhu" title="Icy.Zhu">Icy.Zhu</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="net.icycloud.fdtodolist"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIQofEh0KF25ldC5pY3ljbG91ZC5mZHRvZG9saXN0EAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  高效Todo基于管理学大师史蒂夫.柯维和余世维所倡导的第四代时间管理理论设计。把事情按重要和紧急程度进行分类，通过这种简单而有效的方式，高效Todo可以把用户从纷繁复杂的事务中解放出来，高效Todo与其他日程管理应用不同之处在于，高效Todo颠覆了陈旧的时间管理理念，高效Todo主张高效工作的关键不在时间管理，而是注重如何在有限的时间内产生最大的效益。<br>高效Todo有以下特点：<br>1.高效Todo的主要界面采用了四象限的形式。按照重要紧急程度把事情分成了四类。<br>2.高效Todo还采用了时间轴的形式来组织事情，把事情按照时间先后顺序排列，连接历史和未来。<br>3.高效Todo还具有团队协作的功能。用户可以把事情委派给其他成员来完成，执行者的完成情况也一目了然。<br>4.高效Todo还提供了简单有效的绩效评估方式，团队里谁的贡献大，谁的贡献小，一个数据解决问题。<br>5.高效Todo注重用户的隐私保护，私事和公事完全隔离，[我的私事]里的任何内容只能自己看到，公共群组里的任务可以在成员之间分享。 You can rename, delete, get file details, create folders open local and remote files. It comes with share feature for gallery. YouSnap) 是一款你必備的影像翻拍擷取行動App。簡易上手的操作介面自動為你校正拍攝畫面、改善畫質，確保內容更加易讀。你能拍下會議簡報、白板筆記、名片、地圖或旅途中所見的海報資訊。你更可將圖片儲存為PDF或JPG檔，快速整理相片內容，透過電子郵件分享或直接上傳至Facebook。</p><p>這款專為Android智慧型手機和平板電腦量身打造的影像翻拍擷取App，讓您精確區隔和選擇相片中的重要區域，並即時修改相片角度和提昇畫質，確保內容清晰可讀。</p><p> Snap是一款能詳實記錄會議與腦力激盪過程中白板筆記的完美工具！僅需按下快照鍵，即可儲存想要的內容。您也可快速修正圖像角度和光線問題，讓會議記錄清晰呈現，並直接透過app發送電子郵件與他人分享。</p><p> ◆◇◆ 數位化塵封已久的相片和相簿 ◆◇◆<br>別再讓美好記憶沈睡在生灰的相本裡了！利用YouCam Snap，輕鬆數位化那些早已堆放在角落的昔日家庭相片，甚至不需笨重掃瞄器，也能轉存備份整本相簿。這些記憶影像能存於你的手機或平板，也可直接在app中發送email或上傳至Facebook，與親友分享。</p><p> ◆◇◆ 無紙化的數位文件生活 ◆◇◆<br>擁有YouCam Snap，學生或商務人士即可將重要的產品文宣、書本講義甚至是合約等資料數位化，並儲存於Android手機或平板電腦中。不用再辛苦扛著笨重的大批書面文件，學習及工作更加輕鬆無比。</p><p> ◆◇◆ 翻拍擷取及數位化 ◆◇◆<br>快速翻拍你曾拜訪過都市的地圖、飯店名片、旅遊文章或任何旅途中的重要資訊；也能數位化手寫筆記、收據、發票和明信片。</p><p> ◆◇◆ 付費功能 ◆◇◆<br>即可享有下列功能<br>✩ 移除廣告<br>✩ 移除PDF檔中的浮水印</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" Cal: Any.do Calendar | 日曆  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Any.do" title="Any.do">Any.do</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.anydo.cal"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaFwoVEhMKDWNvbS5hbnlkby5jYWwQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  如果您的安卓日曆是為了讓您更有效率而不只是為了安排您的日常工作事項而設計的，那麼，情況會怎樣呢？Cal會慢慢地改變您的看法，您無需額外努力就能夠獲得明確的目標。該應用位居2013年最佳應用網路榜單之首，是真正釋放安卓潛力的日曆。<br>若以下任意一條對您來說是聽上去像真的，那麼，Cal就可能適合您：<br>- 有些日子讓人感覺像是一個黑洞，而不是一個明確的時間表<br>- 您想要在一個地方獲得工作和個人生活的平衡<br>- 您尋求和諧，可能甚至想要在日常生活中添加一些玩笑趣味<p><br>功能<br>以下是該應用的精妙之處 – 儘管條目比較多，但一點也不複雜混亂。它擁有一個順暢直觀的介面，讓您在需要這些功能時發現他們的強大。<br>■ 即時同步：同步您的所有當前日曆，包括穀歌日曆和Exchange<br>■ 工作/生活平衡：自然地將工作日程表和個人生活計畫融合在一個地方。您的日曆獨特的靈活性能夠滿足不斷變化的需求，并將讓您始終覺得它是專門為您而定制的。<br>■ 安卓小部件：從主屏快速查看您的一天安排，無需打開應用<br>■ 語音輸入和預測文本輸入：更快更輕鬆地添加事件和詳細信息。只需說出來或者開始輸入，便可獲得讓人驚嘆的準確自動建議。<br>■ 社交智能：該應用能夠預測您想要與誰見面，甚至會提議附近的見面地點<br>■ 重點尋找：可視化時間表功能可以讓您找到自由時間以平衡生活、工作，和“我的時間”，不會漏掉任何事情<br>■ 慶祝：總是會有人過生日。在朋友的Facebook留言牆上留言、打電話、發送短訊，或者通過Amazon 或Gifts.com購買禮物<br>■ 導航：使用內置穀歌地圖、位智（Waze）和Uber更加快速地前往會議或者事件地點<br>■ 任務追蹤器：通過將Cal與Any.do（我們的獲獎任務應用，它完美地交織在您的日曆中）連接在相同的地方充實您的日曆和處理任務。<br>■ 清新視覺 – 9種特別策劃的照片主題，豐富的圖形，為您的每一天添加和諧<br>■ 橫屏視圖和月視圖：只需從月視圖中跳至一個特定的日期，然後傾斜您的手機獲得更加開闊的日曆視圖<br>■ 提醒：根據提醒和重複事件設置時間和地點<br>■ 事實上，您會期待要去查看日曆 這款應用及其姊妹任務應用Any.do是我們對“我該怎樣做完所有事情？”的解決方法。讓每一天都變得快樂，並且享受戰勝即將出現的困難的樂趣。</p><p>We love to stay connected with our users! href="/store/apps/details?id=com.jaredco.screengrabber" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.jaredco.screengrabber" title="Screen Grabber"> 279.    Screen Grabber  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=The+Jared+Company" title="The Jared Company">The Jared Company</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.jaredco.screengrabber"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIwohEh8KGWNvbS5qYXJlZGNvLnNjcmVlbmdyYWJiZXIQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  JaredCo delivers again with Screen Grabber – the totally flexible screen capture app that lets you share your screen shots with anyone. Simple. Easy. Useful. <p>** If you have never taken a screen shot with the hardware buttons for your device you may want to do a Google search to learn how.  Some Android devices use different button combinations than others.</p><p>** Send SMS Permission is needed to allow you to send the screenshot to a friend by SMS.  The app will never send an SMS without you **</p><p>And FREE.</p><p>_______________________________</p><p>INSTRUCTIONS :</p><p> Take a screenshot on the Galaxy S4, S3, or Note 2 using a hand swipe:</p><p>  1. Open Settings &gt; Motion.<br>  2. Scroll down and find Hand Motion, then Palm Swipe to Capture, and tick the box.<br>  3. Close the menu and shape your hand like you are “chopping” the screen, set your hand on either side of the screen, then horizontally swipe across it – it doesn’t matter which way. If you’ve done it correctly, you should hear the camera shutter and receive a notification that a picture has been saved to the gallery.</p><p><br>Another way to take a screenshot on the Galaxy S4, S3 or Note:</p><p>  1. Pressing the Power and Home buttons at the same time will also grab an image of the screen. This can be awkward to get right, so it’s important to remember to press both buttons at the same time, and hold them until the shutter sound is heard.</p><p>Both these methods also work on the Samsung Galaxy Notes as well, and the second method is also applicable to the Galaxy S2.</p><p><br>Take a screenshot on other Android 4.0, 4.1, or 4.2 devices: </p><p>  1. Press the Power button and Volume down key at the same time. Remember to hold them until you hear a click or see a screenshot sound. This works on the Samsung Galaxy Nexus and the Google Nexus 7 tablet and should be the first method you try on an Android device. Remember to hold both keys down at precisely the same time, and hold until the shutter clicks.</p><p>_______________________________</p><p><br>With Screen Grabber, send a map or directions to your best friend with a couple of clicks. There’s nothing quite like Screen Grabber and free is always good. Real good.</p><p>•	With a single click take a screen shot of your Android screen. Tap. Done.</p><p>•	Email that screen shot to anyone, anywhere, any time. JaredCo makes sharing simple.</p><p>•	Screen Grabber stores all your screen captures in a new picture file called Screen Grabs. Want to see you contacts list from a month ago? Easy if you grabbed a screen shot of that important client’s phone number. It’s in the file labeled Screen Grabs, right where we put it for you.</p><p>•	Want to send a map or directions to your technically-impaired friends? It doesn’t get any easier than click and send with Screen Grabber.</p><p>•	So simple to synch, Screen Grabber does it all for you. Download and you’re good to go.  </p><p>Pictures, app icons, maps, tools, contacts, addresses – no matter what’s showing up on your screen, Screen Grabber stores it in one place so you don’t have to fumble for what you need now.</p><p>And best of all, Screen Grabber is totally free so it costs you zip. But, like all JaredCo apps, it delivers real functionality that enhances your Android experience.</p><p>You’ve got nothing to lose and lots of utility to gain. Like all JaredCo apps, we design them, we build them and we support them. Even the FREE ones.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="cover-inner-align"> <img alt="Dropsync (Dropbox Autosync)" class="cover-image" data-cover-large="https://lh6.ggpht.com/uvnsM_JkFRb2eHOj3JNow37RvX334AdCNIa7_eBnsCVxq6Zj8TBbVDuwf4gLyBrcDw=w340-rw" data-cover-small="https://lh6.ggpht.com/uvnsM_JkFRb2eHOj3JNow37RvX334AdCNIa7_eBnsCVxq6Zj8TBbVDuwf4gLyBrcDw=w170-rw" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.ttxapps.dropsync" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.ttxapps.dropsync" title="Dropsync (Dropbox Autosync)"> 283.    Dropsync (Dropbox Autosync)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=MetaCtrl" title="MetaCtrl">MetaCtrl</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.ttxapps.dropsync"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHgocEhoKFGNvbS50dHhhcHBzLmRyb3BzeW5jEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Dropsync 讓您自動同步和分享無限制的檔案與資料夾於 Dropbox 以及您信任的其它裝置。 同步和分享任何檔案！ 相片、影片、文件、PDF、MP3、電子書、備份、...<p>在您裝置上的新檔案會立刻上傳到 Dropbox。 在 Dropbox 的新檔案會自動地下載到您的裝置。 如果您刪除其中一邊的檔案，另一邊的也會被刪除。 這可以跨多個裝置工作(如您的手機與您的平板電腦)。 如果這些資料夾被同步於相同的 Dropbox 帳號，將會彼此之間保持同步。</p><p>這就是 Dropbox 桌面客戶端的工作方式，但與官方 Dropbox 應用程式不同，該應用程式需全部都手動指定。 Dropsync 是全部自動的。 例如，它可以設定只要有新照片就會立刻上傳到 Dropbox 的一個資料夾。 這些照片可以被自動地下載到您的其他裝置，包括您的電腦。 如果您之後在其中一個裝置或是您的 Dropbox 刪除了拍壞的照片，此應用程式也會在其他地方刪除它們。 無需手動處理。</p><p>雙向自動同步從開始時應該要是官方 Dropbox 應用程式的一個基本功能。 不管基於什麼理由，但它不是如此。 Dropsync 在此填補了這個空缺。</p><p>主要的特點</p><p><br>- 在背景執行完整雙向自動同步，就像桌面版本的 Dropbox 一樣<br>- 許多種同步方式。 不但有雙向，您也可以選擇僅上傳、上傳後刪除、僅下載、下載後刪除、鏡像下載、...<br>- 即刻上傳:新的檔案會立刻上傳到 Dropbox<br>- 非常有效率，幾乎沒有消耗電量<br>-- 容易設定。 一但設定好檔案便會保持同步狀態，不會讓使用者花費功夫<br>- 即使改變不同的網路條件都可以在您的手機上可靠地工作<br>- 監控電量、WiFi/3G/4G/LTE/WiMax 連線以及根據使用者偏好設定調整其行為<br>- 可設定自動同步的間隔時間: 15分鐘、30分鐘、每小時、...<br>- Tasker 附加元件允許進階使用者定義複雜地同步行程和條件</p><p>如果喜歡這個應用程式，請考慮升級至專業版本。 藉此支持開發的努力以及取得存取專業版的功能。 Dropsync 專業版金鑰可以在 Google Play Store 中找到。 安裝金鑰將會解開 Dropsync 的專業版功能。</p><p>專業版特點</p><p><br>- 同步多對資料夾<br>- 上傳超過 8 MB 的檔案<br>- 智慧型變更偵測(快速同步!)<br>- 在一個本地資料夾同步您整個 Dropbox<br>- 應用程式設定可以使用密碼保護<br>- 應用程式中不會有廣告顯示<br>- 應用程式開發者的 Email 支援</p><p>支持</p><p>請至我們的網站(http://metactrl.com/)取得更多關於此應用程式的資訊，包括FAQ。</p><p>如果您遇到應用程式任何問題或建議可以讓我們做得更好，請不要猶豫地寄電子郵件 dropsync@metactrl.com 給我們。 我們將竭盡所能地協助您。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" Canon Mobile Printing  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Canon+Inc." title="Canon Inc.">Canon Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" class="description">  此為 Canon 雷射印表機或多功能雷射印表機（非 PIXMA 系列、SELPHY 系列或 MAXIFY 系列印表機）的免費應用程式，可從智慧型手機、平板電腦等 Android 裝置輕鬆列印影像、Microsoft Office 檔案、PDF 檔案及網頁等內容。<p>若要使用 PIXMA 系列、SELPHY 系列或 MAXIFY 系列印表機進行列印，請使用 PIXMA/MAXIFY Printing Solutions 或 Canon Easy-PhotoPrint。</p><p>主要功能<br>- 可輕鬆快速設定紙張尺寸。<br>- 單次最多可列印 20 張影像。<br>- 可顯示並列印網頁。<br>- 能與各種應用程式及列印檔案連結。<br>- 列印 Microsoft Office 檔案。*<br>- 使用 PDF 直接列印執行高速列印。**<br>- 可詳細指定各項列印設定，如彩色模式、頁數、雙面列印。<br>- 可自動偵測網路上的印表機，或指定 IP 位址/FQDN 進行手動搜尋。<br>- 可將列印資料儲存於多功能印表機和一般印表機（並非任何印表機皆可支援）。<br>- 從應用程式輸入部門 ID 和密碼，透過使用 部門識別碼管理 功能的多功能裝置和印表機進行列印。<br>- 執行在列印時需要輸入使用者名稱和密碼的安全列印。<br>- 根據多功能裝置和印表機所搭載的選購配件，在應用程式中顯示最佳的列印設定。<br> <br>* 使用網際網路資料轉換服務。<br>** 只有配備 PDF 直接列印或 PS 列印功能的印表機機型，或搭載選購 HDD、ROM 或 RAM 的印表機機型才可支援。</p><p>支援的印表機<br>imageRUNNER ADVANCE 系列<br>Color imageRUNNER 系列<br>imageRUNNER 系列<br>Color imageCLASS 系列<br>imageCLASS 系列<br>i-SENSYS 系列<br>LBP 系列<br>Satera 系列<br>Laser Shot 系列</p><p>某些印表機機型無法支援 Canon Mobile Printing。請在 Canon 網站的 Canon Mobile Printing 支援頁面檢閱支援的印表機機型清單。</p><p>必要條件<br>- Android 裝置必須連線到無線 LAN 存取點。<br>- 多功能印表機或印表機及存取點必須透過 LAN 或無線 LAN 連接。</p><p>可列印的檔案<br>- 影像<br>- Microsoft Office 檔案*<br>- PDF 檔案<br>- 網頁<br>* 使用網際網路資料轉換服務。<br> <br>列印注意事項<br>- 由於各種印表機所支援的列印功能各不相同，因此印表機可能會無法依照您在本應用程式所採用的列印設定輸出列印資料，實際情況視您使用的印表機機型而定。<br>&nbsp;</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a Jorte Sync  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Jorte+Inc." title="Jorte Inc.">Jorte Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="jp.co.jorte.sync"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGgoYEhYKEGpwLmNvLmpvcnRlLnN5bmMQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  [Jorte Sync] is an application that can sync information from various services with Jorte Calendar.<p>For example, When you Sync with Facebook and Foursquare, You can see the content of your friend's posts or your own displayed in Jorte.<br>The day there is a post from friends that you have selected, their icon and posted photos can be displayed in Jorte.</p><p>IMPORTANT Update: At the end of April Facebook will update it's API, this update limits which information Jorte can access.</p><p>What does this mean to you as a Jorte Sync user?</p><p>If you used the Facebook post sync feature:<br>You will be required to login again with Jorte Sync and grant access to syncing your Facebook Posts.</p><p>In addition you will now only be able to sync posts from Friends who are also using Jorte Sync to sync their Facebook posts.<br>Previously you could select which of your Friends who are on Facebook to sync their posts with Jorte Calendar, this is no longer possible with the updated Facebook API.</p><p>Unfortunately In practice this means it will no longer be possible to sync many of your friends &amp; family's posts.<br>This change has been made by Facebook, NOT Jorte, if you dislike this change you may contact &amp; file a complaint with Facebook, you may let them know you dislike their updated API and how it affects other applications such as Jorte Sync.</p><p>If you sync other services such as Flickr or Instagram with Jorte Sync:<br>The Facebook API update will have no impact on syncing with other services that Jorte Sync supports.</p><p>Yahoo! Calendar, Facebook, Foursquare, Instagram, Exchange ActiveSync, and Flickr are currently supported.<br>We are also planning to add support to link with many more services in the future.</p><p>Jorte Sync with Facebook support was developed by Jorte and does not represent an endorsement or sponsorship by Facebook Inc.</p><p>Exchange ActiveSync Known Issues:<br>. Editing Repeating All Day events is not supported due to API limitations.<br>. If you need to Edit a Repeating All Day event please use Outlook on PC.</p><p>Application Description:</p><p>Jorte Calendar: An application with 21 million downloads.<br>[Jorte Sync] is an application developed in order to connect with many calendar services available throughout the world.<br>You can always try using your calendar service in Jorte Calendar, an application that is both visually pleasing and easy to use.<br>Of course, you can always display Jorte Cloud and Google Calendar together in it. Also, by adding event calendars you can display the events that you find interesting along with your work schedules from another calendar service.<br>By all means, we invite you to try the possibilities of Jorte Calendar now further expanded through [Jorte Sync] and discover the experience of a world linked by calendars.</p><p>How to use:</p><p>. Install Jorte Sync.<br>. Start Jorte Sync and select the service that you would like to use.<br>. Log in to the service using its ID to authenticate.<br>. Once the authentication is complete, the procedure is complete in this application.</p><p>Start Jorte Calendar:</p><p>Launch Jorte Calendar and select the service you want to use (Yahoo! Calendar, Facebook, Instagram, Foursquare, etc.) from the [Calendar] list.<br>If the log in has already been completed, it will sync automatically with the selected service.<br>If you have not yet logged in, it will link with Jorte Sync, log in once again and return to Jorte Calendar.<br>This application is a "Login tool" to connect Jorte Calendar with other services.</p><p>Future Plans:</p><p>. To include more calendar services.<br>. Groupware services.<br>. Check-in system services.</p><p><br>Other features may be added at any time<br>https://jorte.net/certify/account/useAgreement/</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span 寫日程、任務及紀念日變得更容易<br>- 免費提供總有700多種貼圖<br>- 提供天氣信息等<br>※ 新版日曆(v.3.1.5)只能在Android OS 4.0以上啓動。 <br>&nbsp;<br>* 隨時隨地，能夠管理日程。. <br>除了日程、假日、農曆紀念日管理以外，還利用事先提醒功能管理重要日程的智慧型應用程序——NAVER日曆！<br>此外提供各種裝飾功能，讓用戶充覺得有趣！<br>此外，也可在手機上確認到您在PC注冊的日程，還能隨時隨地輸入新日程和約會。<br>&nbsp;<br>[主要功能] <br>1. 可一目了然地管理日程、紀念日和任務 <br>除了紀錄日程外，還能簡單填寫日常任務並同時管理農曆日程。 <br>2. 准時提醒 <br>就容易會忘掉的紀念日而言，一旦注冊一次，就能准時提醒記得住不容易的農曆紀念日，可有效地管理日程。 <br>3. 一鍵就可寫成日程 <br>若在每月顯示模式將日期按幾秒，即可注冊日程、任務和紀念日。<br>4. 通過各自喜歡的顯示模式查看日程<br>簡單顯示日程時使用顯示列表模式，要分時段來管理時使用顯示時間模式！<br>5. 日曆移動<br>將日曆快點上下揮著，即將移動一個月。 如果您願確認月末和月初，就試著滑動頁面。<br>6. 使用範疇和貼圖功能首飾日曆！ <br>對日程和紀念日使用喜歡的顔色分類，還能利用各種各樣的貼圖強調日程。 <br>可愛貼圖增加到700多種，更好玩地裝飾日曆畫面。 <br>7. 利用微件，還可在智能手機桌面上直接確認到日程。<br>利用今天/日曆/目錄/任務模式微件，在智能手機的桌面也可簡單確認到一天的日程。 <br>即可設定透明程度，又可適用6種類型。<br>8. 提供天氣信息<br>你可在每月顯示上確認道一周之間的天氣，還可在今天目錄顯示上確認到當前天氣。<br>9. 使用清單管理任務<br>向右揮著可以完成，向左揮著可以刪除，容易創建任務群組。<br>10. 查看紀念日<br>您試著利用D-day確認即將到來的紀念日，您的日常生活會格外愉快。<br>11. 共同管理的共享日曆 <br>可與朋友、情人、家人和同事等分享管理。 <br>12. 支持時間表功能 <br>這還支持與學生、家庭主婦必不可分的時間表功能。您試著設在微件一目了然地管理日程。.<br>13. 簡單與其他日曆聯動 <br>您可調用使用的手機默認提供的日曆來使用。 <br>14. 調用facebook朋友生日 <br>您可在紀念日菜單彙集管理朋友和家人的生日和紀念日，並發送祝賀消息。 <br>15. 支持時區更改功能<br>您位在海外時，或在與位在海外的朋友約會時，都可方便更改時區後注冊日程。<br>&nbsp;<br>如果在使用應用程序時産生疑問或問題，請聯系NAVER日曆客服中心。 (   <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  i-nigma turns your camera into a sophisticated barcode reader. Thanks to exceptionally quick and robust scanning, it is regularly ranked as top performer in this category.<p>Features of the i-nigma reader:<br>◇ Scan QR, DataMatrix and UPC/EAN (a.k.a. "Supermarket") codes<br>◇ Additional codes available with our SDK (details below) include: PDF 417, Micro QR, Code 39, Code 128, Codabar/NW7, Interleaved 2 of 5 (ITF), QRcode Models 1&amp;2 <br>◇ Scan colored and creative barcodes<br>◇ Scan reversed codes (bright patterns on dark background)<br>◇ All codes are scanned simultaneously - no need to preset barcode types<br>◇ The i-nigma Shopper compares prices of books, games, CDs and many more products at leading online retailer sites such as Amazon and eBay<br>◇ Scan QR and DataMatrix codes off printed material as a quick and easy way to access video, news, music, sweepstakes or any mobile content. <br>◇ Share scanned codes through Facebook, Twitter and other social networks <br>◇ Share scanned codes through SMS<br>◇ Create QR codes on screen for scanning and sharing by other devices<br>◇ Scan vCards or MECARDs, and save to phone contacts<br>◇ Scan Geo barcodes and open them on Map<br>◇ Scan Calendar barcodes and save them to phone calendar <br>◇ Will access your contacts or calendar ONLY FOLLOWING YOUR EXPLICIT REQUEST !<br>◇ Multi lingual support: English, French, Spanish, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian and Hungarian. </p><p>Based on 3GVision's barcode decoding engine, which has become the de-facto standard for Japanese handsets, the i-nigma Barcode Reader SDK is licensed to many mobile developers. For more details go to http://www.3gvision.com/QR-Barcode-Reader-SDK.html.</p><p>We also offer mobile marketers the i-nigma Campaign Manager, an end-to-end solution for creating, managing and tracking mobile barcode activity. See http://www.i-nigma.com/CampaignManager.htm.</p><p><br>Notes on privacy and permissions:</p><p>1. Our policy is that i-nigma is fully respectful of your privacy and hence the data we collect is anonymous and will only be reported in the aggregate.<br>3. We prohibit the use of any personally identifying information or data  without your prior consent. <br>4. GPS location is used to give you more relevant local information when available. Next开关小部件  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=GO+Launcher+Dev+Team" title="GO Launcher Dev Team">GO class="description">  Next开关小部件是一款基于Next桌面的工具类应用。它可以快速设置Wifi、GPS、屏幕亮度、锁屏、蓝牙等功能，为您提供方便的开关操作和编辑设置。Next桌面开关小部件独特的地方在于，具有绚丽的视觉元素和华丽的动态特效，让你在编辑开关位置、开启关闭开关时体验非凡的视觉享受。 <br>注：如果您在升级后遇到无法显示的问题，您可能正在使用盗版的Next桌面，请在Google Play中重新安装正版Next桌面。<p>支持大小：<br>-4x1<br>-1x1</p><p>支持操作：<br>- 功能：Wifi、铃声、亮度、蓝牙、数据、GPS、同步、飞行模式、震动、锁屏、铃声音量调整，媒体音量调整<br>- 手势：上下翻转开关<br>- 更多：编辑开关的位置</p><p>关于无法卸载的问题：<br>我们使用锁屏开关，需要获取锁屏管理权限，激活后将无法直接卸载Next开关小部件；如果您需要卸载，请在“设置-安全-设备管理器”中取消”Next开关小部件”</p><p>如何卸载Next开关小部件<br>因为Next开关小部件有锁屏的权限，如果用户想卸载它，请先执行下面的步骤：<br>在Next桌面主屏按“Menu”键 －&gt; 选择“系统设置” -&gt; 选择“位置和安全” -&gt; 选择“选择设备管理器” -&gt; 确保Next开关小部件没有被勾选。接下来你就可以按照正常程序卸载Next开关小部件了</p><p>有些开关可能会在Next开关小部件升级后不能正常关闭或开启，请执行以下的步骤。<br>如果出现无法WiFi开关不能正常关闭开关的问题，请执行以下步骤(不同机型的设置路径可能稍有区别)：<br>系统设置 -&gt; 无线和网络 -&gt; WLAN设置 -&gt; 取消勾选”WLAN” -&gt; 再次使用开关小部件的WiFi开关打开无线网络</p><p>如果出现蓝牙开关不能正常关闭开关的问题，请执行以下步骤(不同机型的设置路径可能稍有区别)：<br>系统设置 -&gt; 无线和网络 -&gt;蓝牙设置 -&gt; 取消勾选”蓝牙” -&gt; 再次使用开关小部件的蓝牙开关打开蓝牙功能 </p><p>如果出现锁屏开关无法正常使用，请执行以下步骤：<br>系统设置 -&gt; 本地与安全（或者安全）-&gt; 选择设备管理器 -&gt; 把“Next开关小部件“取消打钩 -&gt; 再次使用开关小部件的锁屏按钮进行锁屏</p><p>怎样添加Next桌面小部件？<br>-长按Next桌面屏幕的空白位置，点击Next桌面小部件，再选择你想要添加的小部件。添加前请确保当前屏幕有足够的空间摆放小部件。</p><p>如果您遇到任何问题，或者对我们的Next桌面程序有任何建议，请随时告知我们，谢谢！<br>反馈邮箱: nextlauncher@gmail.com<br>Facebook: 與省電模式)：★</p><p> <br>► 省電建議：根據剩餘的電池壽命建議適當的動作 (例如， 關閉藍芽)<br>► 省電警示：在正確時間利用簡單行動呼叫通知您以延長電池壽命<br>► 自動緊急延長：根據您的喜好自動執行省電行動 <br>► 剩餘電池詳細資料：以剩餘時間 (以分鐘或小時計) 方式檢視您裝置的電池壽命<br>► 讓你的手機不只是手機，直接取代電腦鍵盤，說話就能直接輸入至Word/Excel/Email/Facebook等多種應用程式，還能查詢多種語系的翻譯結果，史上最強的電腦輸入工具，絕對零門檻、好上手。<br>※ 無須安裝：無須繁複的軟體安裝流程，只要搭配專屬APP，並連結您的智慧型手機與電腦，即可將口說文字直接輸入至電腦中<br>※ 辨識多語：支援中/粵/英/日/韓/法/德/義/西語音輸入，每分鐘輕鬆輸入近200字。<br>※ 多元應用：直接開啟Word/Excel/PowerPoint/Email/Skype/Facebook等程式，直接口語輸入並辨識。<br>※ 符號功能：提供快捷符號與口說符號功能，可輕鬆透過點選或是直接口說的方式，將所需要的標點符號直接加入至文字段落中，無須記憶鍵盤位置或是切換輸入方式。<br>※ 口說翻譯：直接口語輸入就能直接查看整句翻譯，速度快、效率高，支援多達近70國語系，撰寫多語文件更輕鬆。<br>※ 發音示範：只要口說您熟悉的語言，就能聆聽到各種翻譯後的發音結果，學習語言超方便。<br>※ 翻譯應用：辨識及翻譯結果都能快速送到各種電腦軟體上繼續編輯或應用。 <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=com.squallydoc.retune" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.squallydoc.retune" title="Retune (iTunes Remote)"> 320.    Retune (iTunes Remote)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=SquallyDoc+Studios" title="SquallyDoc Studios">SquallyDoc Studios</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.squallydoc.retune"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHwodEhsKFWNvbS5zcXVhbGx5ZG9jLnJldHVuZRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Retune is an iTunes remote, it allows you to use your Android device to control iTunes!  Use your Android device to change songs, TV shows, movies from anywhere in your home!<p>iTunes 11 is fully supported with Up Next support!</p><p>Retune will work on any of the following DACP servers:<br>* iTunes v10 or later<br>* MonkeyTunes for MediaMonkey v1.7.1.1 or later<br>* AlbumPlayer TouchRemote<br>* TouchRemote DACP Server for Foobar2000</p><p>Features Include: <br>* Ability to toggle playing/pause, seek in a song, skip forward and backward, set shuffle/repeat, and toggle iTunes visualizer <br>* View all iTunes songs, artists, albums, genres, and composers. <br>* View and play all iTunes movies, rentals, TV Shows, podcasts, iTunes U courses, and audiobooks <br>* View playlists. <br>* View genius mixes. <br>* Ability to play music from any of the viewing categories (songs, artists, albums, genres, composers, playlists, genius mixes, and radio). <br>* Ability to start a genius playlist from the currently playing song. <br>* Ability to search for music, movies, TV Shows, podcasts, and iTunes U courses. <br>* Set which iTunes speakers to use and the current volume for any of those speakers. <br>* Tell iTunes to stream to an Apple TV.<br>* iTunes 11 Up Next Support.  Add songs, albums, artist, genres, composers, and playlists to the Up Next list.  Including the ability to view/remove/reorder songs and parts of the Up Next list.<br>* MonkeyTunes Play Queue support.<br>* View album artwork.<br>* Notification (including expanded notification) controls.<br>* Lockscreen controls. This requires Audio Focus so if you do not like this behavior you can disable the feature in settings.  Android 4.2 has a defect with lockscreen controls causing problems on the lockscreen.  This option is disabled by default for Android 4.2.  Use lockscreen widgets instead for a better user experience.<br>* Built from the ground up to support both phones and tablets!<br>* Multiple Widgets both for small and large screens.<br>* Lockscreen widgets for devices that support it (turn off lockscreen controls for best experience)<br>* Rate songs right from Retune.<br>* Enjoy either the light or dark theme.<br>* Use your device's physical volume buttons to control the iTunes volume within the Retune app.<br>* Ability to enable Retune to pause the currently playing song when a call is received and start playing again once the call finishes.<br>* Side bar support for quick navigation.<br>* Shared library support.<br>﻿* List and Grid view support.<br>* Ability to lock the screen on.<br>* View the now playing artist/album from the Now Playing screen.<br>* Integration with MusicBoss for Pebble.  Requires Music Boss 1.6.1+<br>* iTunes Radio support (iTunes 11.1 required)</p><p>Requires: <br>* WIFI for Android device to connect to iTunes. <br>* Computer running iTunes v10.0, MonkeyTunes for MediaMonkey, AlbumPlayer TouchRemote, or TouchRemote for Foobar2000 on the same network as your Android device.  Retune has not been tested with any other DACP servers which have not been listed as supported.</p><p>Special Thanks To:<br>Antoine Pillot for translating to French.<br>Lucas Felipe da Cunha for translating to Portuguese.<br>Jonas Hufen for translating to German.<br>Hwanmoo Yong for translating to Korean.<br>Armando Lozano Gallegos for translating to Spanish.<br>Mario Nicolas Cappello for translating to Italian.</p><p>If you would like to help translate Retune to another language please contact me using the developer email and we can work together to add a translation.</p><p>Retune does not play iTunes music on your Android device.  It is merely a remote for iTunes.</p><p>iTunes, AirPort, AirPlay and AppleTV are trademarks of Apple Inc. Other trademarks are the property of their respective owners. 行動防毒 Antivirus  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=NQ+Mobile+Security+(NYSE:NQ)" title="NQ Mobile 在您下載安裝應用程式時，立即進行掃描，免受病毒、惡意軟體和間諜軟體威脅<br>- 手動立即掃描手機與SD卡中所有檔案與應用程式<br>- 當您的手機處於GPRS連線時，可自動更新病毒碼，防堵日益增多的惡意程式威脅<br>- 當您用手機內建瀏覽器上網時，會在您瀏覽網頁時自動偵測並阻擋含有惡意程式的網頁連結，保護您免受釣魚網站及惡意網站威脅及攻擊<br>- 當您設置自動定期掃描時，程式將在設定間隔週期時自動進行掃描，及時幫您發現威脅<br>- 當您啓動防竊聽功能時，程式會保護您的通話安全，防止被竊聽<br>- 當您手機性能下降時，可以使用系統優化功能，提升手機性能</p><p>B. 應用程式連線監控<br>可顯示連線中的應用程式清單，您可以手動強制結束可疑程式，或根據您的需要關閉暫時不使用的程式，以釋放記憶體，提高手機運行速度，減少手機耗電量。<br>即日起，提供台灣大哥大月租型用戶60天免費使用，下載安裝後即可免費使用全部功能，無需進行服務申裝。當60天免費使用期滿時，用戶可再自行決定是否付費續用。 近期內更會開放讓非台灣大哥大用戶一同體驗！</p><p>想要知道更多有關「行動防毒」的服務資訊，請參考：http://vas.taiwanmobile.com/event/antivirus/</p><p>*************************<br>關於網秦（NYSE：NQ）：<br>成立於 2005年，網秦是一家全球領先的行動安全服務提供商，提供成熟的行動安全解決方案。用戶數超過1億，遍布全球100多個國家。網秦榮獲得知名獎項和榮譽，包括2011年世界經濟論壇的科技先鋒，與被時代週刊遴選為“十個將改變你生活的新創公司“之一。網秦屢獲殊榮的雙引擎核心技術，提供了快速和有效的病毒掃描和清除功能，截至2011年7月，網秦“雲安全”資料分析中心已可全面偵測阻擋當前已知超過3500種手機病毒，網秦更於2011年通過美國西海岸實驗室安全認證標章。</p><p>欲瞭解更多資訊，請訪問 <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=%E6%AC%A2%E8%81%9A%E6%97%B6%E4%BB%A3" title="欢聚时代">欢聚时代</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.yy.pomodoro"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGQoXEhUKD2NvbS55eS5wb21vZG9ybxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  ❀最美的番茄工作法APP，幫妳戰勝拖延癥。❀<br>★最有效的習慣養成工具，讓妳習慣性優秀。★<br>這壹切，都將在壹場美萌的農場城堡養成遊戲中實現。<p>番茄工作法/Pomodoro是現今最簡單易行的GTD時間管理方法，專心正是基於此法打造，治理於幫妳告別拖延癥、告別壞習慣、告別手機依賴癥、告別低頭族，讓妳更加專註於妳的工作、學習！讓妳成為公司的工作精英、學校的學霸！</p><p>【特色功能】<br>1.基於萌果種植的番茄工作法工具<br>如果妳想要壹段時間不玩手機，去集中註意力工作，就可以在專心app裏種下壹顆萌果種子。在接下來的25分鐘內，萌果將會慢慢長大，越長越美。如果在此過程中妳禁受不住手機的誘惑，離開專心app去玩遊戲、刷朋友圈，小萌果就會被妳殘忍殺害。<br>而這個過程正是利用了番茄工作法的原理，即利用絕對專註的25分鐘盡早完成手上工作，幫妳告別拖延癥，打造高效的時間管理模式。</p><p>2.習慣養成<br>妳可以規劃每天的好習慣，專心APP會幫助妳決策、並在到點時提醒妳去執行。讓妳成為壹個改掉壞習慣的行動派！<br>同時，習慣養成還強勢推出了多人模式。妳可以組織朋友在同壹個“習慣訂單號”裏養成同壹個好習慣，壹起打卡、相互加分。即使不在身邊，朋友間也可相約互督。</p><p>3.美萌的農場城堡遊戲與時間管理的結合<br>無論是番茄工作法的專註，還是養成好習慣的行動派，這壹切都將在壹場畫風美萌的農場城堡養成遊戲中實現，讓妳高效而不枯燥、進步而又養眼。</p><p>4.全球排行榜<br>妳的專註做事、妳的習慣養成，都有相應的分值機制。所以，妳的進步與成就，都可以在排行榜中，與全球的小夥伴壹起排名，相互激勵、共同進步。</p><p>【隨時找到組織】<br>官網：zx.yy.com<br>官方QQ群：385355547</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> 在書店，圖書館看書、看雜志時發現精彩詞句，或重要數據、資訊，想及時摘錄下來，又想同時分享給朋友或想自己留存下來怎麽辦？若只用傳統的筆紙摘錄輸入到計算機還需通過鍵盤重新輸入一遍，但這些難題雲脈文檔識別能爲你統統解決。<p>産品簡介：<br>文檔識別，利用手機直接拍攝文檔圖像的方式，自動識別提取圖像上的文字信息，可編輯、複制、備份OCR辨識結果，導出爲txt文本；也可拍攝文檔，美化後生成高清圖片或PDF導出；總之，文檔識別可以爲您隨時隨地拍攝記錄重要文檔資訊，提供了文檔掃描、存儲、檢索、管理、分享、同步、多平台檢索等一體化功能服務，並可通過電郵、微信等方式分享發送給好友！</p><p>功能介紹：</p><p>1.  掃描識別<br>使用手機拍攝文檔圖片，省去手動錄入的繁瑣，通過OCR識別技術自動識別，將圖片上文字提取爲txt文本，還可編輯識別結果，複制、保存或分享。所有紙質文檔電子化，瞬間完成；<br>2.  文檔美化<br>拍攝文檔圖片，可手動裁切邊框保留文檔最精華的部分，裁切後的文檔原圖可以通過增強、灰度模式、黑白文檔等方式美化後生成高清圖片或PDF，讓文檔更清晰更容易管理保存；<br>3.  管理分享<br>系統自帶的文檔分類、批量操作、排序管理等功能讓您輕松管理文檔資源；查看文檔圖片時，可以寫批注，可以將處理後的文檔圖片、文檔文字、PDF文件等輕松分享到微信朋友圈，讓您的文檔管理和分享更簡單；<br>4.  文檔糾錯<br>編輯識別結果時系統自動提供後選集字符供選擇替換文字，智能校正需修改的文字，進而提升效率；<br>5.  快速檢索<br>支持拼音、拼音首字母、及任意關鍵字智能搜索圖片上的文字的和識別後的搜索文檔，並高亮展現，還可對圖片進行便捷的分類查找；<br>6.  文檔同步<br>手機裏有重要文檔害怕丟失，可以通過注冊賬戶，將文檔同步到文檔識別的雲端，還能在手機、平板、電腦之間隨時查看、拷貝和傳輸，讓您的文檔管理更安全、更方便。</p><p>關注@雲脈OCR 微信公衆號：OCR-yunmai，爲您實現免費在線拍照識別名片、文檔、證件、車牌等，減少您手工錄入的工作量，提高錄入效率。</p><p>雲脈科技可根據客戶具體需求定制提供OCR SDK 供系統集成商進行二次開發，也可以提供OCR引擎授權，合作咨詢專線：+86 400 0592 812。</p><p>我們的客服時間是北京時間周一至周五，8：30至18：00</p><p>使用場景：<br>企業人士：工作中識別重要文件、外出識別合同、發票、機票，快速識別存儲<br>教師、學生：識別課業學習資料，並進行內容編輯整理<br>旅行者：外出旅行隨時隨處拍攝識別，快捷的整理歸類和關鍵文字快速檢索</p><p>識別語言：<br>文檔識別語言支持：中文簡體、中文繁體、英文、法語，西班牙語、德語、意大利語、葡萄牙語、荷蘭語、丹麥語、瑞典語、芬蘭語和土耳其語等識別語言供您選擇。</p><p>版本適配手機：<br>全面適配安卓5.0系統，適配小米、三星、HTC、索尼等手機</p><p>會員服務：<br>提供應用內購買文檔識別會員服務，訂購後永久使用文檔識別享受以下服務：<br>1. 342.    Jarvis - My Personal Assistant  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=ItsMyLab" title="ItsMyLab">ItsMyLab</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.itsmylab.jarvis"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHQobEhkKE2NvbS5pdHNteWxhYi5qYXJ2aXMQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Jarvis is a one of a kind novelty personal assistant app with a cool factor like none other in the store, skyrocketing your phone's coolness factor to a whole new level. <p>NOTE: Jarvis currently supports only English language. If you are looking for a full version without In-App purchases, please check out our PRO version.</p><p>But don't get us wrong, Jarvis is more than just a show off, he can be your personal assistant keeping you informed about weather, news, calls, text messages and what more, control your phone settings like turning on WiFi, Flash, Bluetooth to name some, play songs over bluetooth, set reminders based on people.</p><p>Jarvis adds a cool factor to every thing he does making you look awesome!</p><p>Widget support<br>Access Jarvis from your lock screen with a single tap. Save notes &amp; access them with Notes widget.</p><p>Wearable support<br>Jarvis runs on your Android wearable as well. Ask him to play songs by name, update your phone's background, change phone's settings &amp; the list goes on.</p><p>WakeUp Alarms<br>Use Jarvis to set quick wake up alarms, this couldn't get any easier.</p><p>Calls &amp; Messages<br>Make calls &amp; send text messages with Jarvis, all you have to do is just tell him.</p><p>CloudVoice Dynamic conversations<br>Jarvis is dynamic in conversation. He has a variety of answers for variety of questions &amp; some of them are outright funny. If he doesn't know any, he learns them over time.</p><p>Notifications<br>Get voice notifications about weather, news, battery status &amp; power levels.<br></p><p>Automatic wallpaper update <br>Jarvis can update your home screen wallpaper automatically almost every day keeping it refreshed.<br></p><p>Theme support<br>Customize the appearance of the app by selecting from Mark I, Mark II &amp; Mark III themes.<br></p><p>Device control <br>Control your phone settings like Flash, WiFi etc<br></p><p>People reminder <br>A one of a kind reminder which allows you to link reminders to your contacts so you get reminded when you get or make a phone call.<br></p><p>Media playback <br>Play media by name, album, artist. Shuffle the list, play or stop.<br></p><p>Bluetooth Support beta <br>If your device is running JellyBean or up, you can use your bluetooth headset to control Jarvis, play media over it and do tons of other stuffs. This feature is still in beta so don't be alarmed if some bugs pop up.<br></p><p>General searches <br>Ask Jarvis general questions like "Who is the first president of USA", "How many meters are in a kilometer", "Convert 100 cm to inches"<br></p><p>Office hours &amp; Night mode <br>It's always irritating when your phone notifies you something when you are in office or when you are home getting a good sleep. Jarvis understands that and has you covered with two modes, Office Mode &amp; Quiet hours<br></p><p>Contextually Aware <br>Jarvis is contextually aware of time &amp; device settings and he adapts himself based on when you wake him up.<br></p><p>Easter eggs <br>Apart from the regular chores, Jarvis tries his best to keep you entertained. There are some easter eggs hidden inside the app, see if you can uncover them.<br></p><p>If you encounter any bugs or want to see a feature get implemented, please do write to us before giving a negative review.<br></p><p>Privacy No contents of your phone ever leave the device to any server (except the speech recognition).<br> <br>Please Note: "Jarvis - My Personal Assistant" is in no way associated or endorsed with the actual character.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span Network Speed Booster  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Alportela+Labs" title="Alportela Labs">Alportela Labs</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.alportela.apptoola.network_booster"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaMAouEiwKJmNvbS5hbHBvcnRlbGEuYXBwdG9vbGEubmV0d29ya19ib29zdGVyEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Network Speed Booster renews the connection to cell sites to try to improve your signal reception &amp; internet speed!<p>Simply tap the "START" button, sit back and allow Network Speed Booster to present you with a fresh network and in most cases a stronger signal.</p><p>How it works? It simply disconnects your from current network station and connects you again. </p><p>Other features:<br>• Data connection switch<br>• WiFi state switch<br>• Easy to use interface</p><p>USER REVIEWS:<br>• "Had another network booster app...deleted since this one gave me back my 3g..:-)"<br>• "I was skeptical at first, but this is my first day using this app and so far it is working well. Recommend it to others"<br>• "It does exactly what it says. I've had some serious problems with my mobile network not working (4 bars and no data?) I run this once and I have an amazing internet connection!"<br>• "wow it really works my internet speed on my phone is like 200 meg per second"<br>• "Great app for extending battery life as well as improving signal!"<br>• "Jay! My internet speed is blazing fast!"</p><p>Please send us your feedback! Any suggestion is welcome!</p><p>Network Speed Booster was among the 10 Hottest Apps on AppBrain on the 26th August and 13th September!</p><p>Note: This app is not a booster and will not do any signal boosting. It merely refreshes your network connection to the carrier. However, in most test cases, it does fix the signal problem most people are having.</p><p>Change log:</p><p>• Version 1.2.7<br>- Added signal strength information on screen</p><p>• Version 1.2.6<br>- Stability improvements</p><p>• Version 1.2.3<br>- Added a Battery Saver section</p><p>• Version 1.2.2<br>- Pocket change support to give you cool rewards!</p><p>• Version 1.2.1<br>- Sharing On Android, rooting can let many users the complete removal and replacement of the device’s operating system version, usually with a more recent release of its current operating system (known as custom ROM).</p><p>NOTE: Research about rooting before rooting your phone. 350.    abFiles (Acer Remote Files)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Acer+Inc." title="Acer Storage Access Framework (SAF) 技術，讓您能使用 Android 應用程式直接瀏覽、開啓個人電腦上的文件。越來越多的 Android 應用程式都支援 SAF，像是 Google QuickOffice, Gmail 與 Google 雲端硬碟。</p><p>簡單分享<br>有了 Acer Prime 帳戶，您將能享受最先進的檔案管理功能，像是遠端 ZIP 管理以及隨選 PDF 轉檔。</p><p>無需先下載，即可遠端在個人電腦上瀏覽 ZIP 檔。使用「ab檔案」，輕鬆進行遠端 ZIP 管理 (如遠端壓縮 / 解壓縮)。<br>將 Microsoft Office 2007 與以上軟體安裝至遠端電腦，您便能以 PDF 格式檢視或下載 Microsoft Office 檔案。如此能減少下載與檢視檔案的時間，也能確保檔案格式完整。例如，在 Android 智慧型手機與平板電腦上以 PDF 格式檢視 PowerPoint 檔案，能完整保留簡報的圖片格式。</p><p>先進的檔案管理功能也使得檔案分享變得更輕鬆快速，如同您使用個人電腦處理檔案一樣，而這就是電腦的長處。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a on-site drawing, giving to professionals in various core fields like architecture, engineering, real estate, home design, and more, the power to measure, draw and view their work on-site.<p>CAD Touch is really easy to use and it's fast multitouch interface will give you the precision and flexibility that pen and paper fail to archive, finally you will have the perfect on-the-go companion for desktop software like AutoCAD™, SketchUp™ or Solidworks™ and every other DWG/DXF compatible app.</p><p>CAD Touch supports every DWG (up to AutoCAD™ 2013) entities for viewing and editing as it uses industry-proof input/output DWG importers, and you can draw new lines, polylines, rectangles, circles, arcs, points (also by xyz coords), hatches, texts, smart/angular dimensions, sketches, revision clouds, raster image, ruler, move, rotate, scale, trim, delete, mirror, offset, group, explode, grips, OSNAP, line/patterns type, alignments guides, objects library, preloaded library with 20+ blocks, feet and inches).</p><p>CAD Touch requires no internet connection, no subscription.</p><p>CAD Touch is a DWG/DXF drawings 2D editor and 2D/3D viewer, you can open, share and save your work in DWG, PDF and PNG (Pro version only, available as a separate app). </p><p>This free version has no limitations in tool power and is bound with five tutorials so you can easily try and learn CAD Touch in a few class="description">  Office辦公助手是一款集成眾多移動辦公的app,轉為android良深定制優化.主要包含一個強大的一體式文件管理器,支持多種文檔格式的文件查看器,貼紙式變遷,手寫板,會議提醒和之後後台錄音的會議錄音機等.初次之外還有如內存優化等輔助功能,來輔助您的移動辦公.<p>!!! 實在是日常工作,文檔查看,聽歌播放,圖片管理,文件管理的必備神器!!!</p><p>軟件功能:</p><p>【功能強大的一體式文件管理器:一個界面解決所有問題,支持多種文檔格式,以及方便地與存儲卡和雲存儲交互】</p><p>- 獨特文件管理操作方式<br>(1) 兩種文件顯示模式:圖標形式和文件詳細信息<br>(2) 左側欄直接切換文件夾,並可對文件進行分類(文檔,視頻,圖片,音樂,其他)和排序(名稱, 日期,大小)<br>(3) 左側欄顯示文件夾，可對當前磁盤的文件夾列表進行展開或隱藏操作,方便使用<br>(4) 系統會自動記錄操作文件夾的步驟,可切換到上一步和下一步操作<br>(5)可以將文件直接存儲到我的文檔目錄下，方便快速定位到目標文件<br>(6) 支持存儲卡作為一個獨立的盤符,支持root文件，系統隱藏文件顯示<br>(8) 文件管理:包括對文件複製, 移動, 刪除, 重命名, 新建文本,新建文件夾,以電子郵件發送文件附件等，支持zip,rar解壓縮和壓縮zip文件，支持APK文件夾,用戶可以直接搜索到所有安裝包，進行直接安裝或批量刪除<br>(9) 文件查看記錄: 系統自動記錄您最近查打開過的文件,生成一個"最近"的文件夾,方便您的再次查看<br>(10) 文件搜索</p><p>- 獨特的文件安全密碼保護,配合應用開機密碼保護,全方位保護您的文件隱私.<br>- 支持文檔格式:ppt,pptx,doc,docx,xls,xlsx,pdf,cad,txt,rtf等<br>- 多媒體文件: mp3,amr,m4a,mp4,3gp,m4v,jpg,png等<br>- 文檔和圖片支持全屏顯示,橫向和豎向自動翻轉<br>- 內置多媒體播放器,支持常用視頻音頻播放格式：當在一個文件夾內選擇一個音樂歌曲文件,系統會自動生成當前文件夾的播放列表，並支持後台播放.<br>- 文本編輯：支持txt文本編輯並可設置文本編碼<br>- windows局域網共享文件操作<br>- 文件傳輸,使用Wi-Fi或USB線對文件進行下載和上傳<br>- 支持通過照相機拍照或錄像,直接生成文件到本地磁盤<br>- 雲存儲: 支持Dropbox作為雲存儲服務<br>- 支持文件搜索<br>- 內附用戶手冊</p><p>【便簽】<br>- 便簽以黑板貼紙的方式顯示,方便查看<br>- 可以設置便籤紙的顏色和字體,讓不同類型的貼紙一目了然<br>- 手寫板可設置顏色和大小,並支持保存成文件</p><p>【帶聯繫人分類的會議提醒】<br>- 支持三種事件顯示方式<br>(1) 事件列表: 顯示當天的全部事件和最近一次事件響應的日期記錄<br>(2) 聯繫人分類顯示:所有的提醒事件按照聯繫人的分類顯示,支持聯繫人搜索.聯繫人分類可以有效的幫助商務人士快速識別參與會議的人員,做到人和事兒高度統一<br>(3) 日曆:顯示日曆和當前事件.日曆的每週第一天可設置星期日和星期一<br>- 提醒事件可設置備忘,時間,重複日期,10種提示音和可編輯的聯繫人</p><p>【會議錄音機】<br>- 錄音時或重複收聽時添加時間標籤,可以快速找到您聽想要的部分<br>- 錄音文件可編輯標籤和名稱<br>- 並行錄音方式: 會議中開啟錄音的同時還可以進行別的操作,如查看文件或編輯便簽,並且不會錯過標記會議的重要議題.當然應對枯燥無味的會議,也可以開啟錄音的同時打開您的小說,這樣工作娛樂兩不誤. o(∩_∩)o</p><p>【系統優化和信息】<br>- 一鍵自動系統內存優化,讓手機達到最佳運行狀態<br>- 支持後台自動檢測內存狀態,當內存使用率高的時候及時提示您優化內存.<br>- 系統信息查看,查看CPU狀態,內存使用狀態,磁盤使用狀態,網絡地址狀態</p><p>【應用安全密碼登錄】<br>- 支持輸入數字密碼和滑屏解鎖兩種密碼登錄方式,保護您的隱私.</p><p>如果您在使用中有任何問題,或者有任何方面的意見建議,通過以下方式都可以聯繫到我們,我們將在24小時內給您回复.<br>1.新浪微博: @elinasoft<br>2.騰訊微信公共賬號: @elinasoft<br>3.電子郵件: support@elinasoft.com</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" 微软车库的产品Next锁屏，帮助你更加快速的启动手机应用和获取重要信息。它专门为繁忙的工作人士节省时间而特别设计。你可以方便的查看自己的日程，未接来电，短信等重要信息，方便的一键进入电话会议。同时，Next锁屏还能够根据你所处的不同环境把你习惯使用的应用自动放置在锁屏上。<br> <br>功能特性：<br>1.	日程表。快速浏览今日日程安排和下一个要进行的会议的时间和地点。<br>2.	应用快捷方式。从锁屏界面快速启动你最常使用的应用。它会根据场景，自动展示你最常用的应用。当然，你也可以自己去设置那些你最常用的应用，把它们放在你最喜欢的位置。<br>3.	重要信息。在锁屏上呈现重要的通知信息，包括短信，彩信，微信，WhatsApp，Facebook Messenger，环聊，LINE(连我)。（目前支持安卓4.3及以上版本）<br>4.	锁屏安全。提供自带的数字和图形密码，帮你更好的保护手机安全。<br>5.	音乐播放控制。支持在锁屏上控制音乐播放。现在就来一首你最爱的歌曲吧。（目前支持安卓4.3及以上版本）<br>6.	本地天气。天气情况我先知。随时在锁屏上查看最新天气。<br>7.	一键拨入电话会议。无须拨打电话和输入会议密码，一键进入电话会议。<br>8.	最懂你的壁纸：锁屏会根据你当前所处位置来自动变化壁纸。同时你也可以自己设置自己喜欢的壁纸。<br> 百資日本語輸入法  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Linpus+Technologies,+Inc." title="Linpus Technologies, MemoCool emulates the typical “Post-it” stuck with magnets on the fridge in your house, but now has the advantage that you can take it with you in your pocket. You can create, edit, archive or delete notes any number of times without limit.<br> <br>You also have at your disposal a widget which allows you to have your notes visible on your home screen allowing you to never forget your tasks.<br><br><br>✪✪✪✪✪ (NOTES IN HOMESCREEN) Or how to use the widget ✪✪✪✪✪<br>1. Open MemoCool and create a note.<br>2. Exit MemoCool.<br>3. Go to the Widget section of your device (you can find it in Widget Tab from your apps list or doing a long press from your homescreen).<br>4. Drag and drop the MemoCool widget to your homescreen.<br>5. Select the note you want to display using the top arrows from the note.<br>6. data-cover-large="https://lh5.ggpht.com/OrUgotjmfRx50mzuafprHAt1E8uCarsgo_QjcqhaTpyTizwTcg3LpcK5tJ9CZU0AdoVL=w340-rw" class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.uzumapps.wakelockdetector" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.uzumapps.wakelockdetector" title="Wakelock Detector-Save Battery"> 387.    Wakelock Detector-Save Battery  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=UzumApps" title="UzumApps">UzumApps</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.uzumapps.wakelockdetector"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJwolEiMKHWNvbS51enVtYXBwcy53YWtlbG9ja2RldGVjdG9yEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  "Wakelock Detector"<br> <br>是否有想过为何您的智能手机在它应该自动关闭屏幕的时候却一直亮着，屏幕突然亮起或者虽然您已经退出应用程序并关闭屏幕但您的手机电量还是用得飞快？ 这些可能是持有唤醒锁的应用程序造成的。“Wakelock Detector”通过检测唤醒锁使用历史来帮助您找到Android设备上消耗电池的应用程序。 现在使用该应用，您就可以很容易地找出哪些应用程序在消耗您的电池！<p> “Wakelock”是Android系统上的电源管理机制，其它应用程序可以用它来保持CPU唤醒（局部唤醒锁），保持/开关屏幕（完全唤醒锁）。 不正确使用唤醒锁权限的应用程序可能导致CPU和手机屏幕保持开启状态，用户不会察觉，就是它们造成明显的电池消耗。</p><p>“Wakelock Detector” 显示所有应用程序的唤醒锁使用信息，甚至是一启动就持有唤醒锁的应用。 默认显示CPU唤醒锁，按最长使用时间排序。 另外，您可以选择屏幕唤醒锁类型来查看与屏幕相关的唤醒锁。 举个例子，如果您的屏幕在屏幕超时后仍然开启，或者您的屏幕时不时自动开启，那么您就可以选择顶部的屏幕唤醒锁类型（亮度图标）来查看哪些唤醒锁一直在唤醒您的屏幕。 还有，如果您想看看正在运行的应用程序，那么您可以将排序方式改为”活动“，它会将正在运行的应用程序显示在顶部。 更多细节，请参考设置中的常见问题。</p><p>主要功能：<br># 显示CPU唤醒锁(局部唤醒锁)和(完全唤醒锁) ;<br># 将应用程序关联的唤醒锁合并为可展开的视图，有更好的用户体验;<br># 当前正在运行的活动进程显示为绿色;<br># 可以按运行状态，唤醒锁时间和字母排序;</p><p>如何使用：<br>#1 安装应用<br> #2 充电到 90% 以上并所拔掉电源线（或者直接重启手机）<br>#3 给点时间（1－2小时）来累积唤醒锁使用信息<br>#4 运行“Wakelock Detector”，它会为您显示所有的唤醒锁信息！<br>#5 检查在顶部的应用，如果它们的唤醒锁使用时间很长，那您找到电池消耗过快的原因了！<br>*注意：唤醒锁统计信息在第3步就开始收集</p><p>注意<br>我们致力于改进 “Wakelock Detector”的性能，添加更多功能，用于解决用户通常面对的唤醒锁问题。 我们会尽量查看你们所有的讨论。 而且我们知道程序目前还不是非常理想的。 如果您在Play商店给出负面评价前，能先通过邮件联系我们，我们将十分感激。 随时欢迎您的反馈。</p><p>评论：<br>XDA - http://www.xda-developers.com/android/defend-your-battery-with-wakelock-detector/<br>HowToGeek - http://www.howtogeek.com/142654/find-out-which-apps-are-keeping-your-android-awake-with-wakelock-detector/<br>LifeHacker - http://lifehacker.com/5993706/wakelock-detector-shows-you-the-apps-that-keep-your-phone-awake<br>DotTech - http://dottech.org/103671/android-review-wakelock-detector/<br>Temefy - http://temefy.com/defend-your-battery-with-wakelock-detector</p><p>关于唤醒锁的简要描述 [推荐] - http://goo.gl/7WgGz</p><p>#注意<br>* MIUI 用户 - 请确保开启电池服务。</p><p>关键字：wakelock detector, wakelock, partial wakelock, class="cover-inner-align"> <img alt="NFC TagWriter by NXP" class="cover-image" data-cover-large="https://lh6.ggpht.com/uv7iw12FXevzUOpvaVM4mNK63yI7rk7fz6AKWKZeWAkd_oz-oz8T4gSLhkYIYGNMSw=w340-rw" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.nxp.nfc.tagwriter" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.nxp.nfc.tagwriter" title="NFC TagWriter by NXP"> 388.    NFC TagWriter by NXP  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=NXP+Semiconductors" title="NXP Semiconductors">NXP Semiconductors</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.nxp.nfc.tagwriter"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button style="display:none" class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHwodEhsKFWNvbS5ueHAubmZjLnRhZ3dyaXRlchABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>   <span class="acquired-label"> <span class="acquired-icon"></span> </span> </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  The NFC TagWriter by NXP stores contacts, bookmarks, geo location, Bluetooth Handover, SMS, Mail, text messages and many more to any NFC-enabled tags as well as to items like posters, business cards, watches and many more containing NFC-enabled electronics. Once data has been stored the application allows also reading and viewing the programmed data including options to launch applications automatically based on the contained data.<p>NOTE: Installing TagWriter on a non-NFC enabled phone is enabled now but it does of course not allow you to actually program tags. Anyhow, you can now prepare NFC data sets e.g. on a large screen device and then share them with an NFC enabled handset to actually make use of them. Besides that you can catch a pre-view on what you could do with a handset supporting NFC.<br>Please contact us at nfcapp.support@nxp.com if you have problems, if you don’t find things you seek for and feel free to contact us if you like things, too. We will continue our efforts to add new features for your benefits and we work hard to provide a feature rich application ahead of other apps available in the market.</p><p>Main Features: [Please refer: http://inspire.nxp.com/tagwriter/tag-writer-user-manual.pdf for advanced features]<br>- Completely redesigned, Intuitive graphical user guidance for all supported functions<br>- Extended support for NXP NTAG 21x Tags – UID mirror, Counter Mirror and Password Feature<br>- WiFi Pairing for handsets supporting this feature<br>- Bluetooth pairing for all NFC enabled Android versions<br>- Application launching with optional data handover<br>- Easily create tag content from your contacts and bookmarks<br>- Create new content with the included NFC data set editor<br>- Convert QR Codes into NFC data sets<br>- View the existing contents of a tag<br>- Export, import and share NFC data sets<br>- Manage your own history of tags viewed and written<br>- Tap to Launch feature to execute content of NFC tags with a simple tap<br>- Backup the contents of a tag before writing it<br>- Erase the contents of a tag<br>- Write-protect a tag<br>- Write multiple tags in sequence<br>- Insert increasing counter values when writing NFC data sets<br>Next to the creation and storing of NFC data sets the NFC TagWriter by NXP also allows to automatically launching applications based on the data read from NFC-enabled tags and items containing NFC-enabled electronics.<br>The following NFC data sets are supported to launch applications:<br>- Contact (vCard) to import data into the address book (Contacts)<br>- Bookmarks (URL) to open a given web address<br>- Plain text to display simple messages directly on the screen<br>- SMS (SMS URI) to create a new message<br>- Mail (Mail URI) to create a new mail message<br>- Telephone number (TEL URI) to start a call<br>- Bluetooth to pair and connect devices<br>- WiFi to connect to WiFi Networks<br>- Geo location to open a given destination- File URI to open a file on the device, including file picker UI<br>- URI to create any kind of URI, also those not directly supported by the NXP TagWriter</p><p>It supports a series of configuration options adapting the application to your own needs and preferences. Don’t miss to have a look into the preferences menu and check what you can explore in the about screen.</p><p>The application fully supports the NFC Forum Type 1 Tag, Type 2 Tag, Type 3 Tag as well as Type 4 Tag portfolio. This includes a whole range of NXP and third party NFC-enabled contactless IC products like MIFARE Ultralight, MIFARE Classic, MIFARE DESFire, NTAG 21x, NTAG I2C,  ICODE SLI and many others.</p><p>We are sorry in case the application might show any functional interruption when using it. Please help us to improve and provide us a so called “crash report” and/or contact us via nfcapp.support@nxp.com. This helps us to detect, analyze and fix possible issues you see when using our application in combination with contactless ICs that have not been verified to work and so may cause problems or unexpected behavior on use.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.nxp.nfc.tagwriter" aria-hidden="true" class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=PanderDEV" title="PanderDEV">PanderDEV</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag <div class="description">  快捷便簽是一個簡單的，真棒記事本應用程式。它給你一個快速和簡單的記事本編輯體驗，當你需要寫筆記，備忘錄，電子郵件，資訊，購物清單和待辦事項清單時。<p>快速捕捉記錄您的想法和及時設置提醒事項。行走中簡單使用語音備忘錄。拍攝海報，收據或文檔中的照片，方便後期輕鬆查找。<br>不同筆記內容使用不同顏色標示，讓你快速找到你所需要的筆記內容。</p><p>這些就是快捷便簽能給你帶來的使用體驗。它比任何其他的記事本或記事本應用程式更加容易。</p><p>主要特點：</p><p>*用顏色標示來整理，區分筆記（彩色筆記本）<br>*便簽備忘錄控制項（直接添加你的筆記到主螢幕上）<br>*待辦事項清單，購物清單。<br>*核對筆記清單來完成待辦事項<br>*添加超過20張圖片<br>*添加5語音備忘錄短片<br>*筆記提醒設置<br>*快速備忘錄/筆記<br>*更改筆記文字大小<br>*資料夾管理的筆記內容<br>*輕鬆和安全備份筆記到SD存儲</p><p>現在就來試試這個全能的便簽應用程式。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> 以你的內存控制：在您的手機。在您的卡。在雲中。<p>SanDisk的內存區為您提供更多的內存比任何其他應用程序的Android™手機可用的管理功能。</p><p>SanDisk的內存區置於完全控制你。管理和備份都用一個免費的應用程序本地和雲存儲。將文件從存儲卡來回選擇雲服務，或直接從雲到手機。雲服務支持：箱，保管箱，谷歌文檔，Picasa和SugarSync的, SkyDrive, Facebook。</p><p>提高移動文件從您的手機的內部存儲器到存儲卡的手機在幾秒鐘內的表現。</p><p>SanDisk的內存區，不僅可以傳輸和備份文件，它也允許你通過一個安全的密碼保護功能的。所以，你有安心知道您的錄像，照片，音樂和其他文件不僅可用，但他們只提供給你。</p><p>在您的手機獲得無縫，你的記憶卡和雲文件，集成的存儲連接。這是前所未有的輕鬆享受，管理，共享和保護您的數字資產。</p><p>不像尷尬，難以定位文件夾結構，SanDisk的內存區有一個直觀的圖形用戶界面，可以讓你把工作做好，快速的工具。</p><p>通過在全球領先的閃存卡而設計，SanDisk的記憶區可以通過可視化的內容類型和大小的內存使用情況。</p><p>SanDisk的內存區。沒有什麼喜歡別的。</p><p>注：隨意發送，而不是一個明星反饋 Device Storage Analyzer  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Mobile+Infographics" title="Mobile class="description">  My Device Storage Analyser 可顯示您設備的 SDcard、USB 設備、內置以及外置存儲設備信息，並以簡單以及清晰的圖表形式展示（信息圖表）。<br>這是一項免費並且無廣告、無病毒的安全項目。<p>★ 這是在 Google Play 中最先進的交互式磁盤空間分析應用。<br>★ “查找無用緩存文件，它可以幫助我快速查找並刪除無用文件以釋放磁盤空間。”<br>★ “這款應用區別于其他文件浏覽器的一項重要功能，它可以非常簡易並且快速地搜索文件並通過其大小排列。”<br>如何使我的設備客觀化展示？其內在又是什麽？其數據被雜亂的交織在一起，它們又是如何關聯的呢？我不想讓我的設備被亂七八糟的數據所充斥，我希望能看見它們的內在本質以及其靈魂。</p><p>● 可視化圖表<br>文件夾以及文件通過一個餅圖被形象地展示出來，並根據它們的大小進行排序。<br>中心周圍的扇形圖表表示您當前的目錄，它們通過一個圓形圖標被展示。其余部分是子文件夾以及文件，您可以點擊扇形部分並深入了解，應用將會繪制您先前所選定的扇形部分並層層展示。</p><p>My Device Storage Analyser 將每一個挂載點作爲一個餅圖繪制，並顯示其已用、剩余可用空間信息並按文件類別進行分類管理（文檔、圖像、視頻、音樂以及其他）以及按拓展名進行分類（比如音樂分類下的子類目錄 MP3、WMA、OGG以及其他）。<br>可用存儲分區信息通過解析挂載點配置文件 vold.fstab 獲取。</p><p>● 強大的全局搜索功能<br>可在運行時采集您設備中所有文件信息，並在數秒內完成完整驅動器搜索，在搜索隊列完成後所有被搜索到的文件將被顯示于快速搜索頁面中。</p><p>● 簡易的大型文件搜索<br>全驅動器內最大的十項文件將被快速顯示。</p><p>● 直觀簡潔的用戶界面<br>友好的用戶界面允許您在多種模式以及頁面中快速切換，My Device Storage Analyser 所使用的視圖界面與 Google Play 一般。<br>您可以在應用內發現以下頁面：</p><p>● 文件分類，內置以及外置存儲設備、SDcard、USB 設備中所有文件將被顯示，通過以下結構化顯示方式：<br>通過文件類別（文件、視頻、音樂以及其他）<br>通過文件大小（最大、較大、中等以及其他）</p><p>● 我的存儲，可顯示設備當前所有可用存儲空間摘要統計信息。</p><p>● 扇形統計，一個直觀且有效的方式顯示設備中數據信息。通過簡單的探索，您就會發現其內部如宇宙般的數據。</p><p>● 十大文件，可顯示您設備中的可用空間是如何被消耗的。</p><p>● 快速搜索，可顯示所需搜索結果以及所選分類詳細內容。<br>點擊文件以顯示二級菜單，您可打開或刪除文檔以及查看其屬性。<br>長按分類或拓展名則會將您轉至快速搜索頁面以查看其執行結果。<br># 應用已針對移動設備（Android 2.3.6）以及平板設備（3.0 及其更高版本）。<br># 該應用依舊處于開發階段，所以可能出現預料之外的情況發生，可能如同 Force Close 等，您的反饋一定會比低分評價更好，謝謝！</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span 超級兔子智能情景模式是一個專門為Android設計的手機場合應用軟件。它完全超過系統自己的飛行模式，而是提供大家經常使用的標準，會議（無聲），戶外（大聲）等系統調節功能，讓您在不同場合啟用手機的相應功能。而這一切均是免費的。<p>超级兔子智能情景模式除了可以設置相應的音量，振動，屏幕亮度外，還有GPS開關，WIFI開關，WIFI-Hotspots開關，藍牙（BT）開關，所有這些你都可以指定在什麼模式下有效。</p><p>智能情景模式還擁有獨家的功能：定時情景模式，你可以設定某個時間開啟某個情景模式，完全不必用手工進行切換了。例如晚上11點後即可設置為沉睡模式，而早上7點再設計為起床模式，上午9點設計為上班模式。</p><p></p> residual quantity, <br>From the desire to carry out brightness change of a screen, turning on and off of Wi-Fi, etc. without stopping a game and YuoTube and other applications, <br>When time and a change, if it moves outside the limit and detaches, it will cancel, and it becomes "empty." <br>The frame which became "empty" can assign functions, such as registration of an application, by carrying out a tap. <br>The number and position of a button can be changed by settings. <br>The size of a button can be changed with pinch in pinch out. <br>The brightness of a screen and the initial value of screen lights-out are changed. </p><p>++InfoBar<br>A setup is chosen from a menu and the domain "InfoBar" always displayed to start service appears. <br>The contents which can be displayed on InfoBar Device will be showing wrong time when you start service. Application will restore time when you stop service, but time may be inaccurate. </p><p>Note that in video I increased speed of time x110, but lower values are supported too, like x2 or x3. At the moment max range is x1000.</p><p>*** Speeding clock may slow down your device, because it will still trigger scheduled events like updates checks, account synchronization and so on. GNotes记事本(随笔记)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Appest+Inc." title="Appest Inc.">Appest Inc.</a> www.weibo.com/gnotes<p>GNotes获得第九期豌豆荚设计奖！<br>http://award.wandoujia.com/gnotes.html</p><p>GNotes是一款能够把你的文字/图片/视频/手写等等同步到GMail,163,126邮箱的安卓记事本，支持备份恢复。</p><p>GNotes专门针对手机的操作做了优化，让你非常方便地记录各种类型的笔记，并且非常方便和GMail，163，126邮箱之间同步。</p><p>如果你有一个笔记包含有很多的内容，在手机上手动输入就会非常麻烦，这时候可以把内容(包含附件)发给你的GMail邮箱，然后给该邮件加上"Notes"标签。<br>当下次你打开GNotes的时候，就会把这封邮件同步到GNotes，保存为一个笔记。<br>更多请参考帮助文档：http://bbs.appest.com</p><p>通过GNotes, 你能方便地做到：<br>- 随时随地和你的GMail同步<br>- 随时备份,恢复笔记<br>- 简洁的widget(桌面小部件)<br>- 记录文本笔记<br>- 记录图片笔记<br>- 记录录音/声音笔记<br>- 记录手写笔记<br>- 记录视频笔记<br>- 记录任何其他文件格式的笔记<br>- 搜索所有的笔记<br>- 分享笔记到其他应用<br>- 针对每个笔记设置提醒</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=org.dayup.gnotes" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> 社群包含了許多新功能與改善。</p><p>作為一套「靈活」的小工具，Chronus 已將 CPU 與行動網路的用量降到最低，並讓您也可以換掉其他的資訊小工具。 同一台裝置中的不同 Chronus 小工具會共用同一套後端服務，並批次進行更新。 這樣就可以更節省電力，但還是能夠提供使用者豐富的資訊。 您可以選擇只使用當中的一部分，或所有功能。沒有用到的功能會被完全停用，不占 CPU 更不耗電。</p><p>請注意:<br>1) 本軟體所需權限的詳細資訊位於: http://goo.gl/EbMLmm<br>2) 若您使用 Xposed 框架來略過 Android 的 Widget API，有些功能會壞掉！ </p><p>功能（所有版本）:<br>- 全功能的 Flex、Flex (Analog)、Clock+、Clock+ (Dash)、Dash 及天氣小工具<br>- wgs84 坐標系。</p><p></p><p>English:</p><p>My GPS Coordinates and Location</p><p>Easily share your GPS location via email, text messaging, or social media.</p><p>Easily share your GPS position via email, text messaging, Twitter, Facebook, WhatsApp, etc.  The recipient receives a link to Google Maps™ with your position on it.  Note that gps does not work well under a roof.  For best result, use outdoors with a clear view of the sky.  Latitude and longitude are displayed in both decimal format and sexgesimal (degrees/minutes/deconds) format.  No data signal is needed for this application.</p><p>Datum used is WGS84.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=%E6%A5%93%E3%82%BD%E3%83%95%E3%83%88%E3%82%A6%E3%82%A7%E3%82%A2" title="楓ソフトウェア">楓ソフトウェア</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.kaede_software.widget.desktoptag"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaLgosEioKJGNvbS5rYWVkZV9zb2Z0d2FyZS53aWRnZXQuZGVza3RvcHRhZxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  ホーム画面に貼り付ける附箋(ふせん)メモウィジェットです。<br>フォントサイズ、フォント色、背景色、背景透明度の指定が可能です。<br>複数の付箋も貼れます。<br>ちょっとしたメモに便利です。<p>付箋の貼り方<br>ホーム画面を長押しすると「ホーム画面に追加」というダイアログが出るので、そこで「ウィジェット」を選択すると「附箋メモ」というものが追加されているので、これを選択すると付箋をホーム画面に貼れます。<br>( ホーム画面でメニューを押して「追加」を選択しても同じです )</p><p>Android 4.0以降の場合はウィジェットのリストから選択して貼り付けられます。</p><p>付箋の剥がし方<br>付箋を長押しすると画面下部にゴミ箱が現われるので、そこまで付箋を移動して指を離せば剥がせます。</p><p>Android 4.1 以降では「附箋メモウィジェット2」もあります。文字位置を右揃えやセンタリングしたり、袋文字の指定が可能です。</p><p>更新でメモが消えないことは確認してリリースしています。<br>本来アプリの更新でメモ内容が消えることはありません。<br>ただ、AQUOS PHONE や ARROWS でアプリ更新時に消えてしまうと言う報告があります。<br>ウィジェットのみ消えて、内部のデータベースが残っているのであれば 1.3 で追加された機能で復元可能です。<br>以下の手順で消えたメモの内容を復元できます。<br>1. 附箋を貼り付けます。<br>2. 設定画面の下から2番目「附箋リスト表示」を選択。<br>3. データベースに保存されているメモ一覧が表示される。<br>4. コピーしたいメモを選択。<br>5. 共有機能でアプリケーションを選択画面が表示される。<br>6. 「クリップボードにコピー」を選択<br>7. メモ内容入力画面に移動<br>8. メモ入力欄を長押し<br>9. 「貼り付け選択」<br>(3) の段階で何も表示されない場合は、データベースが消えてしまっているので復元できません。<br>(6) のところで「クリップボードにコピー」が出来ない場合(Androidのバージョンによります)は、他のテキストを処理できるアプリに一度渡して、取り出すことが出来ます。<br>復元するにはクリップボードへコピーできるアプリが必要になります。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.kaede_software.widget.desktoptag" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span 派客雲圖官方QQ群：115385259(智聚派客)全新上線期待您的加入。即時獲取產品資訊與使用者支援，還能向我們提出您對派客雲圖的獨到見解與需求，贏取高級會員許可權獎勵！<p>CAD派客雲圖（原名ZWCAD Touch）是一款專為各行各業設計師打造的一款全能CAD移動應用。全面支持DWG/DXF/DWF等圖紙檔，即開即用，極速運行！同時具備豐富的CAD繪圖、編輯與輸出功能，讓您在查閱圖紙之外，更能進行常用的修改與批註，並將CAD圖紙輸出為PDF或DWF檔，以郵件形式發送給他人。</p><p>CAD派客雲圖內置數量眾多的國內外各類雲存儲服務，可將CAD圖紙資料直接存放在雲盤中，並與本地保持隨時隨地的資料同步，免除資料線傳檔的煩惱！讓您方便地與設計師或客戶溝通，即使是出行在外，也無需攜帶笨重的筆記本或紙質圖紙，通過雲同步就能隨時瞭解最新設計進展。</p><p>CAD派客雲圖同樣支持完善的離線應用，通過將CAD圖紙存到您的Android設備中，即可隨身攜帶，進行查閱和修改。雲同步中已下載的圖紙，也可以在無網路的情況下隨時查閱。<br>文件管理<br>1. 支援2D和3D DWG/DXF/DWF圖紙格式。<br>2. 支援本地檔、雲端檔（如金山快盤、百度雲、DropBox、GoogleDrive等）與郵件附件。<br>3. 支持通過資料線從PC導入本地圖紙，具備完善的離線使用功能（打開，重命名，另存為，刪除，共用等）。<br>4. 雲端CAD圖紙支援自動同步和檔操作（打開，重命名，另存為，刪除，共用等），具備完善的線上使用功能。<br>5. 支援雲端CAD圖紙的自動緩存，並在離線模式下可用，快取檔案可由用戶自由刪除。<br>6. 支援WebDav網站管理（新增，刪除，修改與文件同步等）。<br>7. 支持通過郵件發送CAD圖紙以及輸出圖紙為JPG/PDF/DWF。<br>繪圖編輯<br>1. 支持通過多指觸控操作進行平移、縮放、捕捉、極軸追蹤，操作方便快捷。<br>2. 支援直線、多段線、圓、文字等CAD繪製功能。<br>3. 支援複製、移動、旋轉、鏡像等CAD編輯功能。<br>4. 支援雲線、標注、圖片、語音等CAD注釋功能。<br>5. 支援線性、半徑、角度、座標等CAD標注功能。<br>6. 支援插入圖塊，以及修改屬性塊的屬性。<br>7．支援局部放大鏡和“上一點”提示。<br>8.支持撤銷和重做。<br>9. 支援強大的CAD圖層和佈局管理。<br>10. 支援三維查看與視角控制。<br>11. 支援圖紙內文本查找與定位。</p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.ZWSoft.ZWCAD" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div> Good to see you here!<br>Solid Explorer is the nicest looking file manager with two independent panels which brings to you a new file browsing experience. It provides to you a wide support for cloud storages including Dropbox, Box, Google Drive and One Drive. This file manager can connect to your Windows PC and many remote servers working with FTP, SFTP and WebDav. You will also appreciate ability to create and extract most commonly used archive formats.</p><p>Two independent panels allows for seamless file transfer with drag and drop. Just hold your finger on a file and drag it to other panel. In this way you can easily transfer files between various locations including PC shares, cloud and root folders.</p><p>If you're looking for a root explorer, this file manager will meet your needs. It features a root explorer with ability to change system level file properties. You don't need to remember about mounting file systems as read/write. Solid Explorer will do it for you automagically. </p><p>Solid Explorer is also a good tool for viewing your media. This file manager can stream music and videos from your PC or cloud without a need to download it. You can even cast the stream to Chromecast!</p><p>With this file explorer you will also receive a very elegant UI look with many customization options, such as dynamic list resizing with pinch gesture or custom color schemes, which will even change the file icon colors.</p><p>Just give it a try! You will not be disappointed.</p><p><br>Tl;dr:<br>- Two independent panels serve as file browsers<br>- Drag and Drop inside and between panels<br>- FTP client with support for secure connections<br>- SFTP client<br>- WebDav client capable of connecting to Owncloud and Yandex<br>- SMB/CIFS client allows for browsing network folders shared with Windows file sharing<br>- FTP server for sharing files to your PC<br>- Ability to read and extract ZIP, RAR and TAR archives<br>- Ability to create TAR archives and password protected ZIP archives<br>- Many cloud clients: Dropbox, Box, SkyDrive (One Drive), Google Drive, Sugarsync, Copy, Mediafire, Owncloud (through WebDav), Yandex (through WebDav)<br>- Root access makes Solid Explorer fully functional root explorer<br>- Indexed search finds your files in a couple of seconds<br>- Detailed file information with storage usage statistics</p><p><br>THIS IS A 14-DAY TRIAL. href="/store/apps/details?id=com.resonancelab.arcfilemanager" title="Arc File Manager"> 431.    Arc File Manager  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Resonance+Lab" title="Resonance Lab">Resonance Lab</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.resonancelab.arcfilemanager"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKQonEiUKH2NvbS5yZXNvbmFuY2VsYWIuYXJjZmlsZW1hbmFnZXIQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Arc File Manager is a powerful file manager support common file operations. The main feature is compressing and decompressing files in popular archive formats like 7z(7zip), rar zip. You can extract more than 30 formats with a single click. It is built with 7zip library which provides faster compression and decompression. You can create/extract password protected, multi-part archives easily. Create shortcut to home screen or create bookmark for faster folder/file access. The supported operations are listed below - <p>RAR5 support added. You can now extract RAR5 files.</p><p>File manager operations<br>=================<br>1. Basic file operations - open, copy, move, delete, send, rename, view details.<br>2. Search files.<br>3. Support list &amp; grid listing.<br>4. Create shortcut to home screen.<br>5. Bookmark favorite file/folders.</p><p>Archive operations<br>=============<br>1. Create following type of archives - 7z(7zip), zip, tar, gz(gzip), bz2(gzip2), xz<br>2. Extract following type of archives - 7z(7zip), rar, zip, tar, gz, bz2, xz, iso, jar, cab, lzh, lha, lzma, tgz, tbz, deb, rpm, zipx and more.<br>3. View/open archive content of following type - 7z(7zip), rar, zip, tar, gz, bz2, xz, apk, jar, iso, cab, lzh, lha, lzam, tgz, tbz, deb, rpm, zipx and more.<br>4. Add/Delete files from supported archives.<br>5. Support creating/extracting of password protected archives.<br>6. Partial extract archive.<br>7. Open archive directly from email &amp; downloads.<br>8. Create/Extract multi-part archives.<br>9. Unicode support.<br>10. Multi-threading on supported devices.<br>11. Support large archives (Size larger 2GB)<br>12. Rar5 support.<br>and More (Explore yourself).</p><p>All the features are absolutely free.</p><p>***This app is supported by Ads***</p><p>*** This app is still in initial development stage. More features will be added. Be patient &amp; please send me email if you encounter anything incorrect. Any suggestions are welcome.***</p><p></p><p>FAQ<br>1. Why this app is asking for password. It's a free app after all.<br>Ans: The app is not asking you for password but the file you are decompressing. Some files are password protected to protect it's content from unauthorized access. You need to know the password in order to decompress the file. Extracting password protected archives are just another feature by Arc File Manager. Non password protected files will work fine.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" Easily print photos, web pages and documents when your mobile device is connected to a compatible Samsung printer through a wireless network or a direct wireless connection to the printer. Control print settings including color, number of copies, paper orientation and paper type.<br>When plug-in updates are available your device will notify you. Print"> 437.    Samsung Mobile Print  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Samsung+Electronics" title="Samsung Electronics">Samsung Electronics</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.sec.print.mobileprint"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIwohEh8KGWNvbS5zZWMucHJpbnQubW9iaWxlcHJpbnQQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Print, Scan or send Fax wirelessly from your Android phone, tablet, or any other supported Android device to almost any* Samsung Laser Printer.<br>Samsung Mobile Print empowers to print or send fax, most of the digital contents like Office documents, PDF, images, emails, web pages or even the contents on your social network sites.<br>Let your content be on your phone or on Google drive it’s just easy.<br>It also supports scanning from your network multi-functional device and saving in various formats like  pdf, jpg or png. Sharing your scanned documents is just a click away.<p>Key Features<br>&gt; Intuitive action bar style user interface.<br>&gt; Automatic discovery of supported network devices.<br>&gt; Support for USB and shared printers.<br>&gt; Select multiple images, tap to crop or rotate.<br>&gt; Supports multiple image sizes and multiple images on a page.<br>&gt; Print or send fax documents/emails/email attachments/web pages/images.<br>&gt; Supports contents at Google Drive, DropBox, Evernote, OneDrive, Box and Facebook.<br>&gt; Scan from flatbed or ADF and save as PDF, PNG, JPG.<br>&gt; Print or Scan pages as big as A3*.<br>&gt; Share to open any of the supported content from any other App.<br>&gt; For corporate environment, supports security features like Job Accounting, Confidential Print and Secure Release.</p><p>**Supports Only Samsung Printers**<br>* Scanning and sending fax is supported only on supported N/W printers.<br>* Printing can be done on printers connected via Print server or Shared.<br>* Maximum print and scan size would depend on the media size supported by the device. <br>* If you use the CJX-1050W/CJX-2000FW printer, please install " Samsung Mobile Print Photo" instead this app. </p><p>Supported Model List<br>* M2020/2070/283x/288x/262x/282x/267x/287x/4370/5370/4580 Series<br>* C410/460/1810/1860/2620/2670/140x/145x/4820 Series<br>* CLP-300/31x/32x/350/360/610/620/660/670/680/770/775 Series<br>* CLX-216x/316x/317x/318x/838x/854x/9252/9352/92x1/93x1 Series<br>* ML-1865W/2150/2160/2165/2250/2525/257x/2580/285x/2950/305x/3300/347x/331x/371x/405x/455x/551x/651x Series<br>* SCX-1490/2000/320x/340x/4623/4x21/4x24/4x26/4x28/470x/472x/4x33/5x35/5x37/6545/6555/8030/8040/8123/8128 Series<br>* SF-650, SF-760 Series</p><p>Permission Details:<br>Below are the details about the permissions Samsung Mobile Print app is using. </p><p>READ_CONTACTS: For selecting Fax number from Address book.<br>READ_HISTORY_BOOKMARK: For showing Bookmarks in Web Printing.<br>GET_ACCOUNTS: For showing registered accounts in email printing and printing contents from Google drive.<br>USE_CREDENTIALS: For printing from Google Drive.<br>CAMERA : To use Camera.<br>INTERNET: For any network communication.<br>WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: To write to SD Card.<br>NFC : For direct connection between mobile device and Printer<br>VIBRATION : To notify when NFC tag was read -&gt; 侧边栏设置</p><p>Q：为何无法删除One触控?<br>A：因为您设置的锁屏功能，系统让把这个应用保护起来，以防止锁屏不可用，只要设置 -&gt; 解锁既可。</p><p>XDA Post: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=39769882</p><p>荣誉<br>One触控被XDA首页报道： The battery widget works with all Bluetooth devices that can be paired with Android. You can use it with Bluetooth headsets and Bluetooth headphones. <p>Your headset has no battery indicator? This can be fixed! Bluetooth Headset Battery Widget measures how long a Bluetooth device (e.g. a headset or headphones) has been connected. If you configure the maximum running time of the headset battery, the widget can tell you how much battery time your headset has left. You can also see how long your headset or headphone has been running without a recharge.<br>Bluetooth Headset Widget Features<br>- Measures the connection time of a Bluetooth device (headset/headphone)<br>- Tells you how much battery time is left until you need a recharge<br>- Automatically stops the counter when the Bluetooth device disconnects<br>- Can display a warning notification to remind you to connect the power to the headset battery<br>- Can display a small battery power indicator in the notification bar, similar to your phones battery display. 449.    BethClip: Clipboard Sync  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=BethClip,+Inc." title="BethClip, Inc.">BethClip, Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.bethclip.android"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHgocEhoKFGNvbS5iZXRoY2xpcC5hbmRyb2lkEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  BethClip is a cloud multi-platform clipboard sync &amp; manage tool.<p>BethClip lets you access your clipboard history later for orginize, view, copy, paste or share. This app does not require you to keep it always open to manage or sync your clipboard. After stat, app goes to work in background and monitor your clipboard (you can anytime enable or disable it) and let you can easily switch to any of your running app. Copy any text or image within any app, BethClip will sync it in background. You can just do paste on your other device (where BethClip also installed) with no matter in which application you are. Your text or image will paste immediately.</p><p>Features you can benefit from:<br>✔ Powerfull clipboard history manager with smart actions;<br>✔ To sync item, just simply copy it;<br>✔ Manage connected devices; even rename or delete them;<br>✔ Share data with other apps via Android's Share button;<br>✔ Multilingual interface;<br>✔ No Ads<br>+ Free subsciption for up to 3 devices;<br>✔ lightly works in background (using minimal resources) so, no needs to switch between apps;<br>✔ Sync copied text, images, numbers, URLs and etc. from any appy;<br>✔ Able to watch history of (each) devices separately;<br>✔ Re-copy, delete or share clipboard data anytime using history manager;<br>✔ Power saving, battery friendly, minimal system resource usage;<br>✔ High performance and no ANRs;</p><p>Supported Languages: English, Azerbaijani, Russian,  Turkish, Ukrainian, German.</p><p>And please, do not hesitate to give your feedback. 453.    @Voice - 大聲朗讀會報讀出顯示在 Android  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Hyperionics+Technology+LLC" title="Hyperionics Technology LLC">Hyperionics Technology LLC</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.hyperionics.avar"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHgocEhoKFGNvbS5oeXBlcmlvbmljcy5hdmFyEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  @Voice - 大聲朗讀會報讀出顯示在 Android 軟體上的文字，例如<br>網頁, 新聞文件, 長篇電子郵件, 簡訊以及更多。<p>重要: 使用這個軟底您必須在設備上安裝文字轉語音引擎和語音。如果您尚未安裝，可以嘗試 Play 商店上的 Acapela, Ivona 或 SVOX TTS 套件。<br>如果您要的話可以使用多個語音。</p><p>功能:<br>* 在任何軟體上典擊 "分享" 或 "寄送電子郵件" 按鈕/選單項目將文字送到大聲朗讀以便透過喇叭或耳機報讀出來。<br>* 如果沒有 "分享" 可以複製其他軟體上的文字轉貼到大聲朗讀來報讀。<br>* 可以選擇及時報讀出複製到剪貼簿的文字。<br>* 可以從 Android 檔案系統中開啟文字或 HTML 檔案來報讀。<br>* 用大聲朗讀開啟的文件可以存成檔案以便事後聆聽。<br>可以建構多文件的收聽清單以便不中斷的一一聆聽。<br>可以按照需要安排清單順序例如<br>重要的文件擺在前面。<br>* Dropbox 同步!<br>開啟然後建立清單在設備上，憶及<br>平板然後用手機收聽。<br>或著從電腦使用瀏覽器的 檔案/令存心黨 - "只有 HTML" 功能儲存到 @Voice Dropbox 資料夾，然後用手機收聽。<br>* 容易控制語音的音量, 音調和速率。<br>* 可以依照需要用有線或藍芽耳機案件暫停/繼續朗讀，也可以按下一個/上一個按鍵來跳躍句子，長案這兩個案件切換到清單裡的下一個/上一個文件。<br>* 可以自動辨認文件的語言並使用適當的 TTS 語音如果有提供的話，或著使用 "選擇語言" 清單項目手動設定你的最愛語音。<br>* 其他的選項還有段落之間暫停, 新的文件載入就馬上朗讀或等候按下按鈕, 當有線耳機插入/拔除時就開始/停止朗讀。<br>* Optional sleep timer to stop speech after a given timeout.</p><p>關於權限:</p><p>完全的網際網路存取是需要的因為網頁瀏覽器的 “分享” 功能和任何我試過的任何新聞閱讀軟體只會寄給我們 URL 地址 (http://something...).<br>他們不會祭出完整的文件文字，所以大聲朗讀必須從網際網路下在文件才能報讀或存檔。<br>只有使用軟體的複製文字功能並轉貼到大聲朗讀，或著使用軟體儲存完整文字到儲存媒體並用大聲朗讀開啟檔案，你才不用連線，但是這樣並不是很方便。<br>而且 - 新的 Dropbox 同步功能當然需要網際網路存取。<br>這是無法可避免的。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.hyperionics.avar" aria-hidden="true"
